# ██████╗ ██╗██╗   ██╗███████╗██████╗ ███████╗
# ██╔══██╗██║██║   ██║██╔════╝██╔══██╗██╔════╝
# ██║  ██║██║██║   ██║█████╗  ██████╔╝███████╗
# ██║  ██║██║╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗╚════██║
# ██████╔╝██║ ╚████╔╝ ███████╗██║  ██║███████║
# ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝  ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝

global_monetary_reference_global_var_fixe = {
	set_global_variable = {
		name = money_value_reference_currency
		value = money_value_reference_currency_flux
	}
	set_global_variable = {
		name = money_value_rapported_inflation_reference_currency
		value = money_value_rapported_inflation_reference_currency_flux
	}
	set_global_variable = {
		name = money_supply_reference_currency
		value = money_supply_reference_currency_flux
	}
	set_global_variable = {
		name = money_supply_stockpile_by_other_country_reference_currency
		value = money_supply_stockpile_by_other_country_reference_currency_flux
	}
}
reference_currency_in_gold_fixe = {

median_currency_value = {
	set_global_variable = {
		name = money_value_median
		value = weighted_average_currency_value
	}
}

global_gold_silver_production = {
	set_global_variable = {
		name = global_silver_production_fix
		value = global_silver_production_flux
	}
	set_global_variable = {
		name = global_gold_production_fix
		value = global_gold_production_flux
	}
}
currency_of_player = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = currency_of_player_is_dinar
			value = 1
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = currency_of_player_is_dinar_algerian_dinar
			value = 1
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = currency_of_player_is_dinar_iraqi_dinar
			value = 1
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = currency_of_player_is_dinar_libyan_dinar
			value = 1
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = currency_of_player_is_dinar_moroccan_dirham
			value = 1
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = currency_of_player_is_dinar_omanian_rial
			value = 1
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {

# ██╔════╝ ██║     ██╔═══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██║         ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗    ██╔════╝██╔═══██╗╚══██╔══╝    ██╔══██╗██║     ██║
# ██║  ███╗██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝███████║██║         ██║   ██║███████║██████╔╝    █████╗  ██║   ██║   ██║       ███████║██║     ██║
# ██║   ██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██║██║         ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██╔══██╗    ██╔══╝  ██║   ██║   ██║       ██╔══██║██║     ██║
# ╚██████╔╝███████╗╚██████╔╝██████╔╝██║  ██║███████╗     ╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║██║  ██║    ██║     ╚██████╔╝   ██║       ██║  ██║███████╗███████╗
#  ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝      ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝    ╚═╝      ╚═════╝    ╚═╝       ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚══════╝

#  ██████╗██╗   ██╗██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗██╗   ██╗
# ██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝
# ██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║      ╚████╔╝
# ██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██║       ╚██╔╝
# ╚██████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗   ██║

#begin_tag_5
	#dinar
	money_value_dinar_global_var = {
		set_global_variable = {
			name = money_value_dinar_global_var
			value = {
				value = 0
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = dinar_leading_currency_type
					}
					add = money_value_target_real_in_gold #money_value_target_real #money_value
				}
			}
		}
	}

			name = money_value_peso_paraguayan_peso_global_var
			value = {
				value = 0
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = peso_paraguayan_peso_leading_currency_type
						#not = {
						#	has_modifier = extreme_weak_currency
						#}
					}
					add = money_value_target_real_in_gold #money_value_target_real #money_value
				}
			}
		}
	}

# ██████╗ ███████╗███████╗███████╗██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗███████╗     ██████╗██╗   ██╗██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗██╗   ██╗

# ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██╔══╝  ██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██║     ██╔══╝      ██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██║       ╚██╔╝
# ██║  ██║███████╗██║     ███████╗██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗███████╗    ╚██████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗   ██║
# ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝     ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝╚══════╝     ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝

# ███╗   ███╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗██╗   ██╗    ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗███████╗

# ██╔████╔██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗   ╚████╔╝     ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║█████╗

# ╚═╝     ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝   ╚═╝         ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝

global_monetary_reference_gui = {
	every_country = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
		}
		global_monetary_reference_1 = yes
	}
}
global_monetary_reference_1 = {
	global_monetary_reference_reset = yes

	#dinar
	if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = global_monetary_reference_dinar
			value = 1
		}
	}
	#dinar_algerian_dinar
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = global_monetary_reference_dinar_algerian_dinar
			value = 1
		}
	}
	#dinar_iraqi_dinar
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = global_monetary_reference_dinar_iraqi_dinar
			value = 1
		}
	}
	#dinar_libyan_dinar
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = global_monetary_reference_dinar_libyan_dinar
			value = 1
		}
	}
	#dinar_moroccan_dirham
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = global_monetary_reference_dinar_moroccan_dirham
			value = 1
		}
	}
	#dinar_omanian_rial
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = global_monetary_reference_dinar_omanian_rial
			value = 1
		}
	}
	#dinar_qiran
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = global_monetary_reference_dinar_qiran
			value = 1
		}
	}
	#dinar_saudi_riyal
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = global_monetary_reference_dinar_saudi_riyal
			value = 1
		}
	}
	#dinar_serbian_dinar
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = global_monetary_reference_dinar_serbian_dinar
			value = 1
		}
	}
	#dinar_tunisian_dinar
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = global_monetary_reference_dinar_tunisian_dinar
			value = 1
		}
	}
	#dinar_yugoslav_dinar
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
			has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = global_monetary_reference_dinar_yugoslav_dinar
			value = 1
		}
	}
	#dollar_australian_dollar
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
			has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = global_monetary_reference_dollar_australian_dollar
			value = 1
		}
	}
	#dollar_canadian_dollar
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
			has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency

		limit = {
			has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
			has_law = law_type:law_spe_dong_currency
		}
		set_global_variable = {
			name = global_monetary_reference_spe_dong
			value = 1
		}
	}
	#spe_drachma
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			has_modifier = global_monetary_reference

	global_monetary_reference_2 = yes
}
global_monetary_reference_2 = {
	set_global_variable = {
		name = global_monetary_reference_money_value
		value = {
			value = 0
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
				}
				add = money_value
			}
		}
	}
}

# ███████╗██╗     ██╗   ██╗ ██████╗████████╗██╗   ██╗██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗
# ██╔════╝██║     ██║   ██║██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║
# █████╗  ██║     ██║   ██║██║        ██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║
# ██╔══╝  ██║     ██║   ██║██║        ██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║
# ██║     ███████╗╚██████╔╝╚██████╗   ██║   ╚██████╔╝╚██████╔╝██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║
# ╚═╝     ╚══════╝ ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝   ╚═╝    ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝
#
# ███╗   ███╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗██╗   ██╗    ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗███████╗
# ████╗ ████║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝    ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔════╝
# ██╔████╔██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗   ╚████╔╝     ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║█████╗
# ██║╚██╔╝██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝    ╚██╔╝      ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══╝
# ██║ ╚═╝ ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║███████╗   ██║███████╗╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝███████╗
# ╚═╝     ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝   ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝
#
#  ██████╗ ██████╗ ██████╗
# ██╔════╝ ██╔══██╗██╔══██╗
# ██║  ███╗██║  ██║██████╔╝
# ██║   ██║██║  ██║██╔═══╝
# ╚██████╔╝██████╔╝██║
#  ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝
#
# ██╗███╗   ██╗███████╗██╗      █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗
# ██║████╗  ██║██╔════╝██║     ██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║
# ██║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗  ██║     ███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║
# ██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝  ██║     ██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║
# ██║██║ ╚████║██║     ███████╗██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║
# ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═╝     ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝

#brace

	###########################################################################################################################################################################################
	###########################################################################################################################################################################################
	###########################################################################################################################################################################################
	###########################################################################################################################################################################################

	# ███████╗██╗     ██╗   ██╗ ██████╗████████╗██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗        ███╗   ███╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗██╗   ██╗    ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗███████╗
	# ██╔════╝██║     ██║   ██║██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝        ████╗ ████║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝    ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔════╝
	# █████╗  ██║     ██║   ██║██║        ██║   ██║   ██║███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║███████╗        ██╔████╔██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗   ╚████╔╝     ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║█████╗
	# ██╔══╝  ██║     ██║   ██║██║        ██║   ██║   ██║██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║╚════██║        ██║╚██╔╝██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝    ╚██╔╝      ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══╝
	# ██║     ███████╗╚██████╔╝╚██████╗   ██║   ╚██████╔╝██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║███████║███████╗██║ ╚═╝ ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║███████╗   ██║███████╗╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝███████╗
	# ╚═╝     ╚══════╝ ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝   ╚═╝    ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚═╝     ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝   ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝

	###########################################################################################################################################################################################
	###########################################################################################################################################################################################

	fluctuations_money_value_1_year = {
		change_variable = {
			name = money_value_fixe_var_1_1Y
			add = 1
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				var:money_value_fixe_var_1_1Y = 1
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_var_half_1_year
				value = money_value_rapported_inflation
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:money_value_fixe_var_1_1Y = 2
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_var_1_year
				value = money_value_rapported_inflation
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_1
				value = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_1
				add = var:money_value_var_1_year
			}
			change_variable = { #test
				name = money_value_dif_1
				subtract = var:money_value_var_half_1_year
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_1
				divide = var:money_value_var_half_1_year
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_fixe_var_1_1Y
				value = 0
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					money_value_dif_1_final < -0.5
				}
				#plus de protection comme pour central_bank_bankruptcy & country_bankruptcy
				currency_crisis = yes
			}

		}
	}
	fluctuations_money_value_5_year = {
		change_variable = {
			name = money_value_fixe_var_1_5Y
			add = 1
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				var:money_value_fixe_var_1_5Y = 1
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_var_half_5_year
				value = money_value_rapported_inflation
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:money_value_fixe_var_1_5Y = 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_var_5_year
				value = money_value_rapported_inflation
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_5
				value = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_5
				add = var:money_value_var_5_year
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_5
				subtract = var:money_value_var_half_5_year
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_5
				divide = var:money_value_var_half_5_year
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_fixe_var_1_5Y
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	fluctuations_money_value_10_year = {
		change_variable = {
			name = money_value_fixe_var_1_10Y
			add = 1
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				var:money_value_fixe_var_1_10Y = 1
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_var_half_10_year
				value = money_value_rapported_inflation
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:money_value_fixe_var_1_10Y = 10
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_var_10_year
				value = money_value_rapported_inflation
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_10
				value = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_10
				add = var:money_value_var_10_year
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_10
				subtract = var:money_value_var_half_10_year
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_10
				divide = var:money_value_var_half_10_year
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_fixe_var_1_10Y
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}

	###########################################################################################################################################################################################

	# ███████╗██╗     ██╗   ██╗ ██████╗████████╗██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗         ██████╗ ██████╗ ██████╗
	# ██╔════╝██║     ██║   ██║██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝        ██╔════╝ ██╔══██╗██╔══██╗
	# █████╗  ██║     ██║   ██║██║        ██║   ██║   ██║███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║███████╗        ██║  ███╗██║  ██║██████╔╝
	# ██╔══╝  ██║     ██║   ██║██║        ██║   ██║   ██║██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║╚════██║        ██║   ██║██║  ██║██╔═══╝
	# ██║     ███████╗╚██████╔╝╚██████╗   ██║   ╚██████╔╝██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║███████║███████╗╚██████╔╝██████╔╝██║
	# ╚═╝     ╚══════╝ ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝   ╚═╝    ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝

	###########################################################################################################################################################################################
	###########################################################################################################################################################################################
	###########################################################################################################################################################################################
	###########################################################################################################################################################################################

	fluctuations_gdp_1_year = {
		change_variable = {
			name = gdp_fixe_var_1_1Y
			add = 1
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gdp_fixe_var_1_1Y = 1
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = GDP_var_half_1_year
				value = gdp
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gdp_fixe_var_1_1Y = 2
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = GDP_var_1_year
				value = gdp
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = GDP_dif_1
				value = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = GDP_dif_1
				add = var:GDP_var_1_year
			}
			change_variable = { #test
				name = GDP_dif_1
				subtract = var:GDP_var_half_1_year
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = GDP_dif_1
				divide = var:GDP_var_half_1_year
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = gdp_fixe_var_1_1Y
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit  = {
					GDP_dif_1_final < -0.5
					# is_subject_custom_trigger = no
					# global_country_ranking < 50
					# has_modifier = has_financial_center
					# not = {
					# 	has_modifier = economic_instability
					# }
				}
				economic_crisis = yes
			}
			#country_bankruptcy
			if = {
				limit  = {
					has_modifier = declared_bankruptcy
					not  = {
						#has_modifier = economic_instability
						var:country_bankruptcy = 1 #cette variable ne peut etre reset que si le moddifier declared_bankruptcy n'esxiste plus pour le pays donc qu'il ce soit fait reset par le country_ratting
					}
				}
				country_bankruptcy = yes
			}
		}
	}
	fluctuations_gdp_5_year = {
		change_variable = {
			name = gdp_fixe_var_1_5Y
			add = 1
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gdp_fixe_var_1_5Y = 1
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = GDP_var_half_5_year
				value = gdp
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gdp_fixe_var_1_5Y = 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = GDP_var_5_year
				value = gdp
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = GDP_dif_5
				value = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = GDP_dif_5
				add = var:GDP_var_5_year
			}
			change_variable = { #test
				name = GDP_dif_5
				subtract = var:GDP_var_half_5_year
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = GDP_dif_5
				divide = var:GDP_var_half_5_year
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = gdp_fixe_var_1_5Y
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	fluctuations_gdp_10_year = {
		change_variable = {
			name = gdp_fixe_var_1_10Y
			add = 1
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gdp_fixe_var_1_10Y = 1
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = GDP_var_half_10_year
				value = gdp
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:gdp_fixe_var_1_10Y = 10
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = GDP_var_10_year
				value = gdp
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = GDP_dif_10
				value = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = GDP_dif_10
				add = var:GDP_var_10_year
			}
			change_variable = { #test
				name = GDP_dif_10
				subtract = var:GDP_var_half_10_year
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = GDP_dif_10
				divide = var:GDP_var_half_10_year
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = gdp_fixe_var_1_10Y
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}

	###########################################################################################################################################################################################
	###########################################################################################################################################################################################
	###########################################################################################################################################################################################

	# ██╗███╗   ██╗███████╗██╗      █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗
	# ██║████╗  ██║██╔════╝██║     ██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║
	# ██║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗  ██║     ███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║
	# ██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝  ██║     ██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║
	# ██║██║ ╚████║██║     ███████╗██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║
	# ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═╝     ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝

	###########################################################################################################################################################################################
	###########################################################################################################################################################################################
	###########################################################################################################################################################################################
	###########################################################################################################################################################################################

	cumulative_inflation_5_year = {
		change_variable = {
			name = cumulative_inflation_5_year_counter
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cumulative_inflation_5_year_counter = 1
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = cumulative_inflation_5_year_1
				value = inflation_value
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cumulative_inflation_5_year_counter = 2
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = cumulative_inflation_5_year_2
				value = inflation_value
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cumulative_inflation_5_year_counter = 3
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = cumulative_inflation_5_year_3
				value = inflation_value
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cumulative_inflation_5_year_counter = 4
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = cumulative_inflation_5_year_4
				value = inflation_value
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cumulative_inflation_5_year_counter = 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = cumulative_inflation_5_year_5
				value = inflation_value
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cumulative_inflation_5_year_counter >= 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = cumulative_inflation_5_year_counter
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	cumulative_inflation_10_year = {
		change_variable = {
			name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter
			add = 1
		}

		#_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter = 1
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_1
				value = inflation_value
			}
		}
		#_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter = 2
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_2
				value = inflation_value
			}
		}
		#_3
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter = 3
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_3
				value = inflation_value
			}
		}
		#_4
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter = 4
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_4
				value = inflation_value
			}
		}
		#_5
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter = 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_5
				value = inflation_value
			}
		}
		#_6
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter = 6
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_6
				value = inflation_value
			}
		}
		#_7
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter = 7
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_7
				value = inflation_value
			}
		}
		#_8
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter = 8
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_8
				value = inflation_value
			}
		}
		#_9
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter = 9
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_9
				value = inflation_value
			}
		}
		#_10
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter = 10
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_10
				value = inflation_value
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				var:cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter >= 10
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = cumulative_inflation_10_year_counter
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	cumulative_inflation_since_beginning = {
		change_variable = {
			name = cumulative_inflation_since_beginning
			add = inflation_value
		}
	}

	###########################################################################################################################################################################################
	#inflation_on_consumer_goods
	inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations = {
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1
			add = 1
		}

		#inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_01
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 1
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_1
				value = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_abs
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 2
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_2
				value = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_abs
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_01
				value = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_01
				add = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_2
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_01
				subtract = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_1
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_01
				divide = var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_1
			}
			inflation_on_consumer_goods_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
		}

		#inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_dif_02
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 3
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_3
				value = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_abs
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 4
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_4
				value = inflation_on_consumer_goods_market_value_abs
			}

			set_variable = {

				value = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_abs
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_04
				value = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_04
				add = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_8
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_04
				subtract = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_7
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_04
				divide = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_7
			}
			inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
		}

		#inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_05
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 9
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_9
				value = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_abs
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 10
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_10
				value = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_abs
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_05
				value = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_05
				add = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_10
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_05
				subtract = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_9
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_05
				divide = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_9
			}
			inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
		}

		#inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_06
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 11
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_11
				value = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_abs
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 12
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_12
				value = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_abs
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_06
				value = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_06
				add = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_12
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_06
				subtract = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_11
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_06
				divide = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_11
			}
			inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
			reset_inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = yes
		}
	}
	inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months
			value = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_01
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months
			add = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_02
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months
			add = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_03
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months
			add = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_04
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months
			add = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_05
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months
			add = var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_dif_06
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = inflation_on_military_equipment_rolling_inflation_6_months
			divide = 6
		}
	}
	reset_inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 12
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = inflation_on_military_equipment_market_value_fluctuations_month_1
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	###########################################################################################################################################################################################

	#money_value_dif_01 #6m
	money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations = {
		change_variable = {
			name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1
			add = 1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 1
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_1
				value = money_value
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 2
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_2
				value = money_value
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_01
				value = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_01
				add = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_2
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_01
				subtract = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_1
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_01
				divide = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_1
			}
			# change_variable = {
			#     name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_01
			# 	multiply = -1
			# }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 3
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_3
				value = money_value
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 4
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_4
				value = money_value
			}

			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_02
				value = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_02
				add = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_4
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_02
				subtract = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_3
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_02
				divide = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_3
			}
			# change_variable = {
			#     name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_02
			# 	multiply = -1
			# }
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 5
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_5
				value = money_value
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 6
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_6
				value = money_value
			}


			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_03
				value = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_03
				add = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_6
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_03
				subtract = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_5
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_03
				divide = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_var_month_5
			}
			# change_variable = {
			#     name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_03
			# 	multiply = -1
			# }
		}

		money_value_dif_01_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = yes
		reset_money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = yes
	}
	money_value_dif_01_rolling_inflation_6_months_effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = money_value_dif_01_rolling_inflation_6_months
			value = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_01
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = money_value_dif_01_rolling_inflation_6_months
			add = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_02
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = money_value_dif_01_rolling_inflation_6_months
			add = var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_dif_03
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = money_value_dif_01_rolling_inflation_6_months
			divide = 3
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = money_value_dif_01_rolling_inflation_6_months
			multiply = -1
		}
	}
	reset_money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1 = 8
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_dif_01_market_value_fluctuations_month_1
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}

	#monetary_policy_inflation
	monetary_policy_inflation = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				not = {
					has_variable = monetary_policy_inflation
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = monetary_policy_inflation
				value = 0
			}
		}

		#law_revaluation
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_revaluation_25
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = monetary_policy_inflation
				subtract = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_revaluation_50
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = monetary_policy_inflation
				subtract = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_revaluation_75
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = monetary_policy_inflation
				subtract = 3
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_revaluation_100
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = monetary_policy_inflation
				subtract = 4
			}
		}

		#law_devaluation
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_25
				not = {
					currency_market_goods_lake_ratio > 0.5
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = monetary_policy_inflation
				add = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_50
				not = {
					currency_market_goods_lake_ratio > 0.5
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = monetary_policy_inflation
				add = 2
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_75
				not = {
					currency_market_goods_lake_ratio > 0.5
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = monetary_policy_inflation
				add = 3
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_100
				not = {
					currency_market_goods_lake_ratio > 0.5
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = monetary_policy_inflation
				add = 4
			}
		}

		################################################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on = 1
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = monetary_policy_inflation
				add = var:inflation_value_predicted_devaluation_month_valided
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on = 1
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = monetary_policy_inflation
				add = var:inflation_value_predicted_revaluation_month_valided
			}
		}
	}
	monetary_policy_inflation_reset = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:monetary_policy_inflation < 0
				var:revaluation_on = 0
				var:revaluation_on = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = monetary_policy_inflation
				add = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:monetary_policy_inflation > 0
				var:revaluation_on = 0
				var:revaluation_on = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = monetary_policy_inflation
				subtract = 1
			}
		}
	}

	###########################################################################################################################################################################################
	###########################################################################################################################################################################################
	###########################################################################################################################################################################################
	###########################################################################################################################################################################################

	# ██╗███╗   ██╗███████╗██╗      █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗    ███╗   ███╗ ██████╗ ██████╗ ██████╗ ██╗███████╗██╗███████╗██████╗
	# ██║████╗  ██║██╔════╝██║     ██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║    ████╗ ████║██╔═══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██║██╔════╝██║██╔════╝██╔══██╗
	# ██║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗  ██║     ███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║    ██╔████╔██║██║   ██║██║  ██║██║  ██║██║█████╗  ██║█████╗  ██████╔╝
	# ██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝  ██║     ██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║    ██║╚██╔╝██║██║   ██║██║  ██║██║  ██║██║██╔══╝  ██║██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗
	# ██║██║ ╚████║██║     ███████╗██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║    ██║ ╚═╝ ██║╚██████╔╝██████╔╝██████╔╝██║██║     ██║███████╗██║  ██║
	# ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═╝     ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝    ╚═╝     ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝╚═╝     ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝

	###########################################################################################################################################################################################
	###########################################################################################################################################################################################
	###########################################################################################################################################################################################
	###########################################################################################################################################################################################

	currency_strength_modifier = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = reference_currency
			}
			remove_modifier = reference_currency
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = reference_currency_no
			}
			remove_modifier = reference_currency_no
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = strong_currency
			}
			remove_modifier = strong_currency
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = balanced_currency
			}
			remove_modifier = balanced_currency
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = weak_currency
			}
			remove_modifier = weak_currency
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = extreme_weak_currency
			}
			remove_modifier = extreme_weak_currency
		}

		#################################################################
		#reference_currency
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_reference_currency = yes
			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = reference_currency
				#multiplier = difference_with_average_gold_exchange_rate_currencies_revers_100
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_reference_currency_no = yes
			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = reference_currency_no
			}
		}
		#################################################################
		#strong_currency
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_strong_currency = yes
			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = strong_currency
				multiplier = difference_with_average_gold_exchange_rate_currencies_revers_100
			}
		}
		#################################################################
		#balanced_currency
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_balanced_currency = yes
			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = balanced_currency
			}
		}
		#################################################################
		#weak_currency
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_weak_currency = yes
			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = weak_currency
				multiplier = difference_with_average_gold_exchange_rate_currencies_revers_100
			}
		}
		#################################################################
		#extreme_weak_currency
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = has_central_bank
				money_value_in_gold <= 0.01
				not = {
					has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					is_subject = yes
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = extreme_weak_currency
				multiplier = difference_with_average_gold_exchange_rate_currencies_revers_100
			}
		}
		#################################################################

		#################################################################
		#central_bank_bankruptcy
		if = {
			limit  = {
				has_modifier = extreme_weak_currency
				not  = {
					var:central_bank_bankruptcy = 1 #temps de que le pays reset en, extreme weajk currency cela va va déclanvher la crise -> une crise ce déckanche dure 2 ans si à l'issu des 2ans le pays est toujour en extreme weak currency il va retrigger la crise
				}
			}
			central_bank_bankruptcy = yes
		}
	}
	inflation_modifier = {
		# remove_modifier = deflation_country
		# remove_modifier = inflation_country

		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = inflation_country
			}
			remove_modifier = inflation_country
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = deflation_country
			}
			remove_modifier = deflation_country
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				inflation_value > 0.02
			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = inflation_country
				multiplier = inflation_value_for_modifier
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				inflation_value < -0.02
			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = deflation_country
				multiplier = inflation_value_for_modifier
			}
		}



		# if = {
		# 	limit = {
		# 		has_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		# 		not = {
		# 			or = {
		# 				var:devaluation_on = 1
		# 				var:revaluation_on = 1
		# 			}
		# 		}
		# 	}
		# 	remove_modifier = foreign_exchange_controls
		# }
		# if = {
		# 	limit = {
		# 		inflation_value > 0.5
		# 		not = {
		# 			or = {
		# 				var:devaluation_on = 1
		# 				var:revaluation_on = 1
		# 			}
		# 		}
		# 	}
		# 	add_modifier = {
		# 		name = foreign_exchange_controls
		# 	}
		# }
		# if = {
		# 	limit = {
		# 		inflation_value < -0.5
		# 		not = {
		# 			or = {
		# 				var:devaluation_on = 1
		# 				var:revaluation_on = 1
		# 			}
		# 		}
		# 	}
		# 	add_modifier = {
		# 		name = foreign_exchange_controls
		# 	}
		# }
	}

#brace

# ██████╗ ███████╗██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗
# ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║
# ██║  ██║█████╗  ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║
# ██║  ██║██╔══╝  ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║
# ██████╔╝███████╗ ╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║▄█╗
# ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝  ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═╝
#
# ██████╗ ███████╗██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗       ██╗      █████╗ ██╗    ██╗        █████╗ ███╗   ██╗██████╗
# ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║       ██║     ██╔══██╗██║    ██║       ██╔══██╗████╗  ██║██╔══██╗
# ██████╔╝█████╗  ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║       ██║     ███████║██║ █╗ ██║       ███████║██╔██╗ ██║██║  ██║
# ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║       ██║     ██╔══██║██║███╗██║       ██╔══██║██║╚██╗██║██║  ██║
# ██║  ██║███████╗ ╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║▄█╗    ███████╗██║  ██║╚███╔███╔╝▄█╗    ██║  ██║██║ ╚████║██████╔╝
# ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝  ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═╝    ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝ ╚══╝╚══╝ ╚═╝    ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═════╝

# ███╗   ███╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗██╗   ██╗    ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗███████╗
# ████╗ ████║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝    ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔════╝
# ██╔████╔██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗   ╚████╔╝     ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║█████╗
# ██║╚██╔╝██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝    ╚██╔╝      ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══╝
# ██║ ╚═╝ ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║███████╗   ██║        ╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝███████╗
# ╚═╝     ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝   ╚═╝         ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝

#brace

	###########################################################################################################################################################################################

	# ██████╗ ███████╗██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗        ██████╗ ███████╗██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗
	# ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║        ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║
	# ██║  ██║█████╗  ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║        ██████╔╝█████╗  ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║
	# ██║  ██║██╔══╝  ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║        ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║
	# ██████╔╝███████╗ ╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║███████╗██║  ██║███████╗ ╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║
	# ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝  ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝  ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝
	#
	#         ███╗   ███╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗██╗   ██╗    ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗███████╗
	#         ████╗ ████║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝    ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔════╝
	#         ██╔████╔██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗   ╚████╔╝     ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║█████╗
	#         ██║╚██╔╝██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝    ╚██╔╝      ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══╝
	# ███████╗██║ ╚═╝ ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║███████╗   ██║███████╗╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝███████╗
	# ╚══════╝╚═╝     ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝   ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝

	###########################################################################################################################################################################################

	###########################################################################################################################################################################################

	money_value_target_modification = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				devaluation_money_value_target_trigger = yes
			}
			devaluation_money_value_target = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				revaluation_money_value_target_trigger = yes
			}
			revaluation_money_value_target = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					is_subject_custom_trigger = yes
					market_owner_is_root_univ_with_buiding = yes
				}
			}
			subject_money_value_target = yes
		}
	}
	devaluation_money_value_target = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				scripted_money_value_target = yes
			}
			devaluation_revaluation_money_value_target_scripted = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				not = {
					scripted_money_value_target = yes
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = devaluation_money_value_target
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = devaluation_money_value_target_count
				add = 1
			}
		}
	}
	revaluation_money_value_target = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				scripted_money_value_target = yes
			}
			devaluation_revaluation_money_value_target_scripted = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				not = {
					scripted_money_value_target = yes
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = revaluation_money_value_target
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = revaluation_money_value_target_count
				add = 1
			}
		}
	}
	subject_money_value_target = {
		set_variable = {
			name = money_value_target_1
			value = overlord_money_value_target
		}
	}

	devaluation_revaluation_money_value_target_scripted = {

		#c:GBR
		if = {
			limit = {
				c:GBR ?= this
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = 7.32238
			}
		}

		# has_law = law_type:law_fiat_standard
		# has_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
		# has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
		# has_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
		# has_law = law_type:law_gold_exchange_standard

		#union latine silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					has_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
					has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
				}
				union_latine = yes
			}
			#question je set  le silver standart en fonction de la valeur à l'or
			#equivalent en or
			#0.29032 or
			#4.50000 argent
			#valeur de référence pour avoir le silver standart = 0.29032 x gold_to_silver_rate
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = {
					value = 0.29032
					multiplier = gold_to_silver_rate #target 4.5
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					var:money_value_target_1 < 4.5
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = money_value_target_1
					value = { 4 5 }
				}

			}
		}
		#union latine gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
				union_latine = yes
			}
			#question je set  le silver standart en fonction de la valeur à l'or
			#equivalent en or
			#0.29032 or
			#4.50000 argent
			#valeur de référence pour avoir le silver standart = 0.29032 x gold_to_silver_rate
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value =  0.29032
			}
		}

		#Scandinavian Monetary Union silver
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					has_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
					has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
				}
				or = {
					c:SWE ?= this
					c:DEN ?= this
					c:NOR ?= this
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = {
					value = 0.40300
					multiplier = gold_to_silver_rate #target 4.5
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					var:money_value_target_1 < 25
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = money_value_target_1
					value = { 22 27 }
				}

			}
		}
		#Scandinavian Monetary Union gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
				or = {
					c:SWE ?= this
					c:DEN ?= this
					c:NOR ?= this
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = 0.40300
			}
		}

		#USA silvver
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					has_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
					has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
				}
				c:USA ?= this
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = {
					value = 1.50000
					multiplier = gold_to_silver_rate
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					var:money_value_target_1 < 24.05600
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = money_value_target_1
					value = { 22 25 }
				}

			}
		}
		#USA gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
				c:USA ?= this
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = 1.50000
			}
		}
		#NET silvver
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					has_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
					has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
				}
				c:NET ?= this
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = {
					value = 0.60500
					multiplier = gold_to_silver_rate
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					var:money_value_target_1 < 10.63000
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = money_value_target_1
					value = { 9 11 }
				}

			}
		}
		#NET gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
				c:NET ?= this
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = 0.60500
			}
		}
		#AUS silvver
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					has_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
					has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
				}
				c:AUS ?= this
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = {
					value = 0.30
					multiplier = gold_to_silver_rate
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					var:money_value_target_1 < 11,11
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = money_value_target_1
					value = { 10 12 }
				}

			}
		}
		#AUS gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
				c:AUS ?= this
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = 0.30
			}
		}
		#PRU silvver
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					has_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
					has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
				}
				or = {
					c:PRU ?= this
					c:GER ?= this
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = {
					value = 0.35842
					multiplier = gold_to_silver_rate
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					var:money_value_target_1 < 9.54500
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = money_value_target_1
					value = { 8 10 }
				}

			}
		}
		#PRU gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
				or = {
					c:PRU ?= this
					c:GER ?= this
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = 0.35842
			}
		}
		#RUS silvver
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					has_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
					has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
				}
				c:RUS ?= this
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = {
					value = 0.77400
					multiplier = gold_to_silver_rate
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					var:money_value_target_1 < 18.00000
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = money_value_target_1
					value = { 17 19 }
				}

			}
		}
		#RUS gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
				c:RUS ?= this
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = 0.77400
			}
		}
		#CHI silvver
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					has_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
					has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
				}
				c:CHI ?= this
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = { 32 39 }
			}
		}
		#CHI gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
				c:CHI ?= this
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = { 0.1 1}
			}
		}
		#SPA silvver
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					has_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
					has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
				}
				c:SPA ?= this
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = {
					value = 0.29032
					multiplier = gold_to_silver_rate
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					var:money_value_target_1 < 11.35900
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = money_value_target_1
					value = { 10 12 }
				}

			}
		}
		#SPA gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
				c:SPA ?= this
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = 0.29032
			}
		}
		#JAP silvver
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					has_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
					has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
				}
				c:JAP ?= this
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = {
					value = 0.75000
					multiplier = gold_to_silver_rate
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					var:money_value_target_1 < 24.26000
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = money_value_target_1
					value = { 22 25 }
				}

			}
		}
		#JAP gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
				c:JAP ?= this
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = 0.75000
			}
		}
		#MEX silvver
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					has_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
					has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
				}
				c:MEX ?= this
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = {
					value = 0.75000
					multiplier = gold_to_silver_rate
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					var:money_value_target_1 < 24.44000
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = money_value_target_1
					value = { 22 25 }
				}
			}
		}
		#MEX gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
				c:MEX ?= this
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = 0.75000
			}
		}
		#BRZ silvver
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					has_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
					has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
				}
				c:BRZ ?= this
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = {
					value = 0.82200
					multiplier = gold_to_silver_rate
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					var:money_value_target_1 < 10
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = money_value_target_1
					value = { 9 11 }
				}
			}
		}
		#BRZ gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
				c:BRZ ?= this
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = 0.82200
			}
		}
		#TUR silvver
		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					has_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
					has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
				}
				c:TUR ?= this
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = {
					value = 0.21525
					multiplier = gold_to_silver_rate
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					var:money_value_target_1 < 3.5
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = money_value_target_1
					value = { 2 4 }
				}
			}
		}
		#TUR gold
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
				c:TUR ?= this
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = 0.21525
			}
		}
	}

	###########################
	#desactivé
	money_creation_in_foreign_exchange_reserve = {
		if = { #si  la devise ne doit pas etre revalué et que la couverture en or est supperieur à 75% alors il y a impression de devise
			limit = {
				not = {
					root.revaluation_score > root.devaluation_score_2
				}
				central_bank_metal_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent > 0.75
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_complete
				value = {
					value = 0
					add = money_value_target
					subtract = money_supply
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
				}
				every_scope_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
							add = owner.var:money_value_target_complete
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	money_destruction_in_foreign_exchange_reserve = {
		set_variable = {
			name = money_value_target_complete_destruction
			value = {
				value = 0
				add = money_value_target
				subtract = money_supply
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				money_supply > var:money_value_target_complete_destruction
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
				}
				every_scope_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
							add = owner.var:money_value_target_complete_destruction
						}
					}
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
				}
				every_scope_state = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						}
						change_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1

	###########################


	extreme_weak_currency_solution = {
		change_variable = {
			name = extreme_weak_currency_solution_count
			add = 1
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				var:extreme_weak_currency_solution_count >= 3
			}
			root = {
				save_scope_as = target_country
			}
			currency_law_list = yes
			every_country = {
				if = {
					limit  = {
						has_modifier = has_central_bank
						not = {
							this = root
						}
					}
					save_scope_as = seller
					all_currency_resold = yes
				}
			}
			reset_law_event_currency  = yes
			activate_law = law_type:law_no_market_liquidity
			trigger_event = {
				id = central_bank_event.1
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = extreme_weak_currency_solution_count
				value = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = new_currency_count
				add = 1
			}
		}
	}

	reset_law_event_currency = {
		capital = {
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}

		#dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dinar_c_var_1
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = government_loan
				value = 0
			}
			add_investment_pool = {
				subtract = private_bank_funds
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}
		#dinar_algerian_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = government_loan
				value = 0
			}
			add_investment_pool = {
				subtract = private_bank_funds
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}
		#dinar_iraqi_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = government_loan
				value = 0
			}
			add_investment_pool = {
				subtract = private_bank_funds
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}
		#dinar_libyan_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = government_loan
				value = 0
			}
			add_investment_pool = {
				subtract = private_bank_funds
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}

			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_1
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = government_loan
				value = 0
			}
			add_investment_pool = {
				subtract = private_bank_funds
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					value = 0

				has_law = law_type:law_spe_uni_currency
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_spe_uni_c_var_1
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = government_loan
				value = 0
			}
			add_investment_pool = {
				subtract = private_bank_funds
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}
		#spe_yen
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_yen_currency
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_spe_yen_c_var_1
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = government_loan
				value = 0
			}
			add_investment_pool = {
				subtract = private_bank_funds
			}
			scope:central_bank_site = {
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1

	# ███╗   ███╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗████████╗ █████╗ ██████╗ ██╗   ██╗    ██████╗  ██████╗ ██╗     ██╗ ██████╗██╗   ██╗     ██████╗     ███╗   ███╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗████████╗██╗  ██╗
	# ████╗ ████║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝██╔══██╗██╔══██╗╚██╗ ██╔╝    ██╔══██╗██╔═══██╗██║     ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝    ██╔════╝     ████╗ ████║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║╚══██╔══╝██║  ██║
	# ██╔████╔██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗     ██║   ███████║██████╔╝ ╚████╔╝     ██████╔╝██║   ██║██║     ██║██║      ╚████╔╝     ███████╗     ██╔████╔██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║   ██║   ███████║
	# ██║╚██╔╝██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝     ██║   ██╔══██║██╔══██╗  ╚██╔╝      ██╔═══╝ ██║   ██║██║     ██║██║       ╚██╔╝      ██╔═══██╗    ██║╚██╔╝██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║   ██║   ██╔══██║
	# ██║ ╚═╝ ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║███████╗   ██║   ██║  ██║██║  ██║   ██║       ██║     ╚██████╔╝███████╗██║╚██████╗   ██║       ╚██████╔╝    ██║ ╚═╝ ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║   ██║   ██║  ██║
	# ╚═╝     ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝       ╚═╝      ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝╚═╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝        ╚═════╝     ╚═╝     ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝  ╚═╝

	ai_currency_deflation_inflation = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				currency_market_goods_lake_ratio < 0.1
				currency_market_goods_lake_ratio > -0.1

			}
			ai_no_currency_deflation_inflation = yes
		}
	#deflation_croi
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_no_monetary_policy
				currency_market_goods_lake_ratio > 0.1
			}
			ai_currency_deflation_25 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_25
				currency_market_goods_lake_ratio > 0.25
			}
			ai_currency_deflation_50 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_50
				currency_market_goods_lake_ratio > 0.50
			}
			ai_currency_deflation_75 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_75
				currency_market_goods_lake_ratio > 0.75
			}
			ai_currency_deflation_100 = yes
		}

		#deflation_decroi
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_25
				currency_market_goods_lake_ratio <= 0.1
			}
			ai_no_currency_deflation_inflation = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_50
				currency_market_goods_lake_ratio <= 0.25
			}
			ai_currency_deflation_25 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_75
				currency_market_goods_lake_ratio <= 0.50
			}
			ai_currency_deflation_50 = yes
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_devaluation_100
				currency_market_goods_lake_ratio <= 0.75
			}
			ai_currency_deflation_75 = yes
		}



		# #inflation
		# if = {
		#     limit = {
		#         has_law = law_type:law_no_monetary_policy
		#         currency_market_goods_lake_ratio < -0.1
		#         currency_market_goods_lake_ratio >= -0.25
		#     }
		#     ai_currency_inflation_25 = yes
		# }
		# if = {
		#     limit = {
		#         has_law = law_type:revaluation_currency_25
		#         currency_market_goods_lake_ratio < -0.25
		#         currency_market_goods_lake_ratio >= -0.50
		#     }
		#     ai_currency_inflation_50 = yes
		# }
		# if = {
		#     limit = {
		#         has_law = law_type:revaluation_currency_50
		#         currency_market_goods_lake_ratio < -0.50
		#         currency_market_goods_lake_ratio >= -0.75
		#     }
		#     ai_currency_inflation_75 = yes
		# }
		# if = {
		#     limit = {
		#         has_law = law_type:revaluation_currency_75
		#         currency_market_goods_lake_ratio < -0.75
		#     }
		#     ai_currency_inflation_100 = yes
		# }
	}
	ai_no_currency_deflation_inflation = {
		activate_law = law_type:law_no_monetary_policy
		random_scope_building = {
			limit = {
				is_building_group = bg_bank
			}
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_25
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_50
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_75
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_100
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_25
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_50
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_75
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_100
		}
	}

	ai_currency_deflation_25 = {
		activate_law = law_type:law_devaluation_25
		random_scope_building = {
			limit = {
				is_building_group = bg_bank
				not = {
					has_modifier = devaluation_currency_25
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = devaluation_currency_25
			}
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_50
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_75
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_100
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_25
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_50
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_75
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_100
		}
	}
	ai_currency_deflation_50 = {
		activate_law = law_type:law_devaluation_50
		random_scope_building = {
			limit = {
				is_building_group = bg_bank
				not = {
					has_modifier = devaluation_currency_50
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = devaluation_currency_50
			}
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_25
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_75
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_100
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_25
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_50
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_75
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_100
		}

	}
	ai_currency_deflation_75 = {
		activate_law = law_type:law_devaluation_75
		random_scope_building = {
			limit = {
				is_building_group = bg_bank
				not = {
					has_modifier = devaluation_currency_75
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = devaluation_currency_75
			}
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_25
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_50
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_100
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_25
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_50
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_75
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_100
		}

	}
	ai_currency_deflation_100 = {
		activate_law = law_type:law_devaluation_100
		random_scope_building = {
			limit = {
				is_building_group = bg_bank
				not = {
					has_modifier = devaluation_currency_100
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = devaluation_currency_100
				# multiply = 10
				# months = 6
			}
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_25
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_50
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_75
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_25
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_50
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_75
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_100
		}
	}

	ai_currency_inflation_25 = {
		activate_law = law_type:law_revaluation_25
		random_scope_building = {
			limit = {
				is_building_group = bg_bank
				not = {
					has_modifier = revaluation_currency_25
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = revaluation_currency_25
			}
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_25
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_50
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_75
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_100
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_50
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_75
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_100
		}
	}
	ai_currency_inflation_50 = {
		activate_law = law_type:law_revaluation_50
		random_scope_building = {
			limit = {
				is_building_group = bg_bank
				not = {
					has_modifier = revaluation_currency_50
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = revaluation_currency_50
			}
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_25
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_50
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_75
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_100
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_25
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_75
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_100
		}
	}
	ai_currency_inflation_75 = {
		activate_law = law_type:law_revaluation_75
		random_scope_building = {
			limit = {
				is_building_group = bg_bank
				not = {
					has_modifier = revaluation_currency_75
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = revaluation_currency_75
			}
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_25
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_50
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_75
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_100
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_50
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_100
		}
	}
	ai_currency_inflation_100 = {
		activate_law = law_type:law_revaluation_100
		random_scope_building = {
			limit = {
				is_building_group = bg_bank
				not = {
					has_modifier = revaluation_currency_100
				}
			}
			add_modifier = {
				name = revaluation_currency_100
			}
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_25
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_50
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_75
			remove_modifier = devaluation_currency_100
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_25
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_50
			remove_modifier = revaluation_currency_75
		}
	}
