	# ██████╗ ███████╗██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗    ██╗██████╗ ███████╗██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗     ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗
	# ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║   ██╔╝██╔══██╗██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║
	# ██║  ██║█████╗  ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║  ██╔╝ ██████╔╝█████╗  ██║   ██║███████║██║     ██║   ██║███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║
	# ██║  ██║██╔══╝  ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║ ██╔╝  ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║
	# ██████╔╝███████╗ ╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║██╔╝   ██║  ██║███████╗ ╚████╔╝ ██║  ██║███████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║
	# ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝  ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═╝    ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝  ╚═══╝  ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝

	############################################################################################################################################################
	############################################################################################################################################################
	############################################################################################################################################################
	############################################################################################################################################################

	devaluation_on = {
		change_variable = {
			name = devaluation_on_time
			add = 1
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				var:devaluation_on_time = devaluation_time_month
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = devaluation_on
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = var:money_value_target_valided
			}



			############# Reset
			set_variable = {
				name = devaluation_on_time
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	revaluation_on = {
		change_variable = {
			name = revaluation_on_time
			add = 1
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				var:revaluation_on_time = revaluation_time_month
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = revaluation_on
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = money_value_target_1
				value = var:money_value_target_valided
			}


			############# Reset
			set_variable = {
				name = revaluation_on_time
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}

#  ██████╗███████╗███╗   ██╗████████╗██████╗  █████╗ ██╗         ██████╗  █████╗ ███╗   ██╗██╗  ██╗     ██████╗  ██████╗ ██╗     ██████╗
# ██╔════╝██╔════╝████╗  ██║╚══██╔══╝██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██║         ██╔══██╗██╔══██╗████╗  ██║██║ ██╔╝    ██╔════╝ ██╔═══██╗██║     ██╔══██╗
# ██║     █████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║   ██║   ██████╔╝███████║██║         ██████╔╝███████║██╔██╗ ██║█████╔╝     ██║  ███╗██║   ██║██║     ██║  ██║
# ██║     ██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║   ██║   ██╔══██╗██╔══██║██║         ██╔══██╗██╔══██║██║╚██╗██║██╔═██╗     ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║     ██║  ██║
# ╚██████╗███████╗██║ ╚████║   ██║   ██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗    ██████╔╝██║  ██║██║ ╚████║██║  ██╗    ╚██████╔╝╚██████╔╝███████╗██████╔╝
#  ╚═════╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝    ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═╝  ╚═╝     ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝╚═════╝
#
# ██████╗ ███████╗███████╗███████╗██████╗ ██╗   ██╗███████╗███████╗
# ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔══██╗██║   ██║██╔════╝██╔════╝
# ██████╔╝█████╗  ███████╗█████╗  ██████╔╝██║   ██║█████╗  ███████╗
# ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ╚════██║██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══╝  ╚════██║
# ██║  ██║███████╗███████║███████╗██║  ██║ ╚████╔╝ ███████╗███████║
# ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝  ╚═══╝  ╚══════╝╚══════╝

stockpiling_central_bank_metal_reserves_state = {
	# if = {
	# 	limit = {
	# 		or = {
	# 			has_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
	# 			has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
	# 		}
	# 	}
	# 	storing_gold_1 = yes

	# }
	# if = {
	# 	limit = {
	# 		or = {
	# 			has_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
	# 			has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
	# 		}
	# 	}
	# 	storing_silver_1 = yes

	# }

	storing_gold_1 = yes
	storing_silver_1 = yes
}
storing_gold_1 = {
    every_scope_state = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
            }
            save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}

	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = gold_state_var_1
		value = gold_state_native_for_stockpile
	}
	#######################################################################

    if = {
        limit = {
			gold_market_goods_sell_orders > 0
        }
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gold_var_2
			value = gold_market_goods_sell_orders
		}
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_gold_var_2
           # multiply = 1000
            multiply = 100
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_gold_var_2
            multiply = 4 #month
        }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gold_var_2
				multiply = bimetallic_rate_gold_to_silver
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = gold_state_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_gold_var_2
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = gold_state_1
				value = root.var:gold_state_var_1
			}
		}
    }
}
storing_silver_1 = {
    every_scope_state = {
        if = {
            limit = {
                has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
            }
            save_scope_as = central_bank_site
		}
	}

	#######################################################################
	#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
	set_variable = {
		name = silver_state_var_1
		value = silver_state_native_for_stockpile
	}
	#######################################################################

    if = {
        limit = {
			silver_market_goods_sell_orders > 0
        }

		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_silver_var_2
			value = silver_market_goods_sell_orders
		}
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_silver_var_2
            #multiply = 1000
            multiply = 100
        }
        change_variable = {
            name = stockpiling_silver_var_2
            multiply = 4 #month
        }
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_silver_var_2
				multiply = gold_to_silver_rate
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_silver_var_2
				multiply = bimetallic_rate_gold_to_silver
			}
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = silver_state_var_1
			add = var:stockpiling_silver_var_2
		}
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = silver_state_1
				value = root.var:silver_state_var_1
			}
		}
    }
}
government_loan_month = {
	change_variable = {
		name = government_loan
		add = country_minting_month
	}
}
trade_balance = {
	set_variable = {
		name = trade_balance_in_gold_fixe #c'est une valeur fixe pour calculer le central_bank_reserves sans créer de boucle de calcule qui crer des crash
		value = trade_balance_in_gold
	}
	# #à voir
	# set_variable = {
	# 	name = trade_balance_in_gold_delta_fix
	# 	value = trade_balance_in_gold_delta
	# }
}
gold_by_trade_route = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			import_in_gold > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_gold #debt_in_gold_sc
			add = import_in_gold
		}
	}
	if = {
		limit = {
			export_in_gold > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = excess_in_gold #excess_in_gold_sc
			add = export_in_gold
		}
	}
}

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

# ███████╗████████╗ ██████╗  ██████╗██╗  ██╗██████╗ ██╗██╗     ██╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗      ██████╗██╗   ██╗██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗██╗   ██╗
# ██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝██╔═══██╗██╔════╝██║ ██╔╝██╔══██╗██║██║     ██║████╗  ██║██╔════╝     ██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝
# ███████╗   ██║   ██║   ██║██║     █████╔╝ ██████╔╝██║██║     ██║██╔██╗ ██║██║  ███╗    ██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║      ╚████╔╝
# ╚════██║   ██║   ██║   ██║██║     ██╔═██╗ ██╔═══╝ ██║██║     ██║██║╚██╗██║██║   ██║    ██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██║       ╚██╔╝
# ███████║   ██║   ╚██████╔╝╚██████╗██║  ██╗██║     ██║███████╗██║██║ ╚████║╚██████╔╝    ╚██████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗   ██║
# ╚══════╝   ╚═╝    ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝     ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝      ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝

stockpiling_currency = {
	if  = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				money_value_dinar > 0
				dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
			}
		}
		stockpiling_dinar_c_1 = yes
	}
	if  = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				money_value_dinar_algerian_dinar > 0
				dinar_algerian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
			}
		}
		stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_1 = yes
	}
	if  = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				money_value_dinar_iraqi_dinar > 0

	}
	if  = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				money_value_dinar_libyan_dinar > 0
				dinar_libyan_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
			}
		}
		stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_1 = yes
	}
	if  = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				money_value_dinar_moroccan_dirham > 0
				dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_market_goods_delta > 0
			}
		}
		stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_1 = yes
	}
	if  = {
		limit = {
			or = {
				money_value_dinar_omanian_rial > 0

			or = {
				money_value_leon_leu > 0
				leon_leu_c_market_goods_delta > 0
			}
		}
		stockpiling_leon_leu_c_1 = yes
	}

}

#begin_tag_1
	#dinar
	stockpiling_dinar_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le dinar_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1 & stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_dinar_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_dinar_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
				add = dinar_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_dinar = yes #?


		#stockpiling_dinar_state_1 bank owner & circulating_dinar_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
			}

			#circulating_dinar_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dinar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_c_var_2
					add = dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_dinar_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_dinar & stockpiling_dinar_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_dinar > 0
						export_to_dinar > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_dinar
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_dinar
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_dinar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar
				add = import_in_dinar
			}
		}
		#all_dinar_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_dinar_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_dinar_state  #var:stockpiling_dinar_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#dinar_algerian_dinar
	stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le dinar_algerian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_1 & stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					dinar_algerian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = dinar_algerian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_dinar_algerian_dinar = yes #?


		#stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1 bank owner & circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
			}

			#circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					dinar_algerian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
					add = dinar_algerian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar & stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_dinar_algerian_dinar > 0
						export_to_dinar_algerian_dinar > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_dinar_algerian_dinar
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_dinar_algerian_dinar
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_dinar_algerian_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_dinar_algerian_dinar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar
				add = import_in_dinar_algerian_dinar
			}
		}
		#all_dinar_algerian_dinar_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_dinar_algerian_dinar_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state  #var:stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#dinar_iraqi_dinar
	stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1 & stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
				add = dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_dinar_iraqi_dinar = yes #?


		#stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1 bank owner & circulating_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
			}

			#circulating_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
					add = dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar & stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_dinar_iraqi_dinar > 0
						export_to_dinar_iraqi_dinar > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_dinar_iraqi_dinar
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_dinar_iraqi_dinar
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_dinar_iraqi_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_dinar_iraqi_dinar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar
				add = import_in_dinar_iraqi_dinar
			}
		}
		#all_dinar_iraqi_dinar_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_dinar_iraqi_dinar_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state  #var:stockpiling_dinar_iraqi_dinar_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#dinar_libyan_dinar
	stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le dinar_libyan_dinar_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_1 & stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					dinar_libyan_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
				add = dinar_libyan_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_dinar_libyan_dinar = yes #?


		#stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1 bank owner & circulating_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
			}

			#circulating_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					dinar_libyan_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
					add = dinar_libyan_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_dinar_libyan_dinar & stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_dinar_libyan_dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_dinar_libyan_dinar > 0
						export_to_dinar_libyan_dinar > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_dinar_libyan_dinar
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_dinar_libyan_dinar
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_dinar_libyan_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_dinar_libyan_dinar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_libyan_dinar
				add = import_in_dinar_libyan_dinar
			}
		}
		#all_dinar_libyan_dinar_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_dinar_libyan_dinar_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state  #var:stockpiling_dinar_libyan_dinar_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#dinar_moroccan_dirham
	stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_1 & stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
				add = dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_dinar_moroccan_dirham = yes #?


		#stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1 bank owner & circulating_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
			}

			#circulating_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
					add = dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_dinar_moroccan_dirham & stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_dinar_moroccan_dirham
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_dinar_moroccan_dirham > 0
						export_to_dinar_moroccan_dirham > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_dinar_moroccan_dirham
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_dinar_moroccan_dirham
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_dinar_moroccan_dirham
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_dinar_moroccan_dirham > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_moroccan_dirham
				add = import_in_dinar_moroccan_dirham
			}
		}
		#all_dinar_moroccan_dirham_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_dinar_moroccan_dirham_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state  #var:stockpiling_dinar_moroccan_dirham_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#dinar_omanian_rial
	stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le dinar_omanian_rial_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_1 & stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					dinar_omanian_rial_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
				add = dinar_omanian_rial_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_dinar_omanian_rial = yes #?


		#stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1 bank owner & circulating_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
			}

			#circulating_dinar_omanian_rial_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					dinar_omanian_rial_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
					add = dinar_omanian_rial_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_dinar_omanian_rial & stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_dinar_omanian_rial
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_dinar_omanian_rial > 0
						export_to_dinar_omanian_rial > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_dinar_omanian_rial
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_dinar_omanian_rial
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_dinar_omanian_rial
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_dinar_omanian_rial > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_omanian_rial
				add = import_in_dinar_omanian_rial
			}
		}
		#all_dinar_omanian_rial_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_dinar_omanian_rial_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state  #var:stockpiling_dinar_omanian_rial_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#dinar_qiran
	stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le dinar_qiran_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_1 & stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					dinar_qiran_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
				add = dinar_qiran_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_dinar_qiran = yes #?


		#stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1 bank owner & circulating_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
			}

			#circulating_dinar_qiran_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					dinar_qiran_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
					add = dinar_qiran_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_qiran_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_dinar_qiran & stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_qiran_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_dinar_qiran
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_dinar_qiran > 0
						export_to_dinar_qiran > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_dinar_qiran
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_qiran_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_dinar_qiran
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_dinar_qiran
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_dinar_qiran > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_qiran
				add = import_in_dinar_qiran
			}
		}
		#all_dinar_qiran_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_dinar_qiran_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state  #var:stockpiling_dinar_qiran_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#dinar_saudi_riyal
	stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le dinar_saudi_riyal_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_1 & stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					dinar_saudi_riyal_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
				add = dinar_saudi_riyal_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_dinar_saudi_riyal = yes #?


		#stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1 bank owner & circulating_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
			}

			#circulating_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					dinar_saudi_riyal_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
					add = dinar_saudi_riyal_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_dinar_saudi_riyal & stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_saudi_riyal_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_dinar_saudi_riyal
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_dinar_saudi_riyal > 0
						export_to_dinar_saudi_riyal > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_dinar_saudi_riyal
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_dinar_saudi_riyal
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_dinar_saudi_riyal
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_dinar_saudi_riyal > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_saudi_riyal
				add = import_in_dinar_saudi_riyal
			}
		}
		#all_dinar_saudi_riyal_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_dinar_saudi_riyal_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state  #var:stockpiling_dinar_saudi_riyal_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#dinar_serbian_dinar
	stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le dinar_serbian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_1 & stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					dinar_serbian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = dinar_serbian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_dinar_serbian_dinar = yes #?


		#stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1 bank owner & circulating_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
			}

			#circulating_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					dinar_serbian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
					add = dinar_serbian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_dinar_serbian_dinar & stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_serbian_dinar_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_dinar_serbian_dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_dinar_serbian_dinar > 0
						export_to_dinar_serbian_dinar > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_dinar_serbian_dinar
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_dinar_serbian_dinar
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_dinar_serbian_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_dinar_serbian_dinar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_serbian_dinar
				add = import_in_dinar_serbian_dinar
			}
		}
		#all_dinar_serbian_dinar_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_dinar_serbian_dinar_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state  #var:stockpiling_dinar_serbian_dinar_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#dinar_tunisian_dinar
	stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_1 & stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
				add = dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_dinar_tunisian_dinar = yes #?


		#stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1 bank owner & circulating_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
			}

			#circulating_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
					add = dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_dinar_tunisian_dinar & stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_tunisian_dinar_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_dinar_tunisian_dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_dinar_tunisian_dinar > 0
						export_to_dinar_tunisian_dinar > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_dinar_tunisian_dinar
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_dinar_tunisian_dinar
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_dinar_tunisian_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_dinar_tunisian_dinar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_tunisian_dinar
				add = import_in_dinar_tunisian_dinar
			}
		}
		#all_dinar_tunisian_dinar_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_dinar_tunisian_dinar_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state  #var:stockpiling_dinar_tunisian_dinar_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#dinar_yugoslav_dinar
	stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1 & stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
				add = dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_dinar_yugoslav_dinar = yes #?


		#stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1 bank owner & circulating_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
			}

			#circulating_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
					add = dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_dinar_yugoslav_dinar & stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_dinar_yugoslav_dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_dinar_yugoslav_dinar > 0
						export_to_dinar_yugoslav_dinar > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_dinar_yugoslav_dinar
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_dinar_yugoslav_dinar
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_dinar_yugoslav_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_dinar_yugoslav_dinar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_yugoslav_dinar
				add = import_in_dinar_yugoslav_dinar
			}
		}
		#all_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state  #var:stockpiling_dinar_yugoslav_dinar_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#dollar_australian_dollar
	stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le dollar_australian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_1 & stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state
		}
		change_variable = {
