			name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					dollar_australian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = dollar_australian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_dollar_australian_dollar = yes #?


		#stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1 bank owner & circulating_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
			}

			#circulating_dollar_australian_dollar_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					dollar_australian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
					add = dollar_australian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_dollar_australian_dollar & stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_australian_dollar_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_dollar_australian_dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_dollar_australian_dollar > 0
						export_to_dollar_australian_dollar > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_dollar_australian_dollar
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_dollar_australian_dollar
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_dollar_australian_dollar
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_dollar_australian_dollar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dollar_australian_dollar
				add = import_in_dollar_australian_dollar
			}
		}
		#all_dollar_australian_dollar_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_dollar_australian_dollar_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state  #var:stockpiling_dollar_australian_dollar_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#dollar_canadian_dollar
	stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le dollar_canadian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_1 & stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					dollar_canadian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = dollar_canadian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_dollar_canadian_dollar = yes #?


		#stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1 bank owner & circulating_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
			}

			#circulating_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					dollar_canadian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
					add = dollar_canadian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_dollar_canadian_dollar & stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_canadian_dollar_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_dollar_canadian_dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_dollar_canadian_dollar > 0
						export_to_dollar_canadian_dollar > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_dollar_canadian_dollar
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_dollar_canadian_dollar
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_dollar_canadian_dollar
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_dollar_canadian_dollar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dollar_canadian_dollar
				add = import_in_dollar_canadian_dollar
			}
		}
		#all_dollar_canadian_dollar_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_dollar_canadian_dollar_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state  #var:stockpiling_dollar_canadian_dollar_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#dollar_caribbean_dollar
	stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_1 & stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
				add = dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_dollar_caribbean_dollar = yes #?


		#stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1 bank owner & circulating_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
			}

			#circulating_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
					add = dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_dollar_caribbean_dollar & stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_caribbean_dollar_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_dollar_caribbean_dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_dollar_caribbean_dollar > 0
						export_to_dollar_caribbean_dollar > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_dollar_caribbean_dollar
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_dollar_caribbean_dollar
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_dollar_caribbean_dollar
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_dollar_caribbean_dollar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dollar_caribbean_dollar
				add = import_in_dollar_caribbean_dollar
			}
		}
		#all_dollar_caribbean_dollar_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_dollar_caribbean_dollar_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state  #var:stockpiling_dollar_caribbean_dollar_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#dollar_confederate_states_dollar
	stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_1 & stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
				add = dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_dollar_confederate_states_dollar = yes #?


		#stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1 bank owner & circulating_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency
			}

			#circulating_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
					add = dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_dollar_confederate_states_dollar & stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_dollar_confederate_states_dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_dollar_confederate_states_dollar > 0
						export_to_dollar_confederate_states_dollar > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_dollar_confederate_states_dollar
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_dollar_confederate_states_dollar
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_dollar_confederate_states_dollar
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_dollar_confederate_states_dollar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dollar_confederate_states_dollar
				add = import_in_dollar_confederate_states_dollar
			}
		}
		#all_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state  #var:stockpiling_dollar_confederate_states_dollar_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#dollar_liberian_dollar
	stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le dollar_liberian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_1 & stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					dollar_liberian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
				add = dollar_liberian_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_dollar_liberian_dollar = yes #?


		#stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1 bank owner & circulating_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
			}

			#circulating_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					dollar_liberian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
					add = dollar_liberian_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_dollar_liberian_dollar & stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_liberian_dollar_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_dollar_liberian_dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_dollar_liberian_dollar > 0
						export_to_dollar_liberian_dollar > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_dollar_liberian_dollar
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_dollar_liberian_dollar
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_dollar_liberian_dollar
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_dollar_liberian_dollar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dollar_liberian_dollar
				add = import_in_dollar_liberian_dollar
			}
		}
		#all_dollar_liberian_dollar_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_dollar_liberian_dollar_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state  #var:stockpiling_dollar_liberian_dollar_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#dollar_new_zealand_dollar
	stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_1 & stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
				add = dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_dollar_new_zealand_dollar = yes #?


		#stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state_1 bank owner & circulating_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_currency
			}

			#circulating_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
					add = dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_dollar_new_zealand_dollar & stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_dollar_new_zealand_dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_dollar_new_zealand_dollar > 0
						export_to_dollar_new_zealand_dollar > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_dollar_new_zealand_dollar
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_dollar_new_zealand_dollar
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_dollar_new_zealand_dollar
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_dollar_new_zealand_dollar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dollar_new_zealand_dollar
				add = import_in_dollar_new_zealand_dollar
			}
		}
		#all_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state  #var:stockpiling_dollar_new_zealand_dollar_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
	stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_1 & stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
				add = dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar = yes #?


		#stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state_1 bank owner & circulating_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency
			}

			#circulating_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
					add = dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar & stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar > 0
						export_to_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
				add = import_in_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar
			}
		}
		#all_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state  #var:stockpiling_dollar_sierra_leonean_dollar_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#dollar_united_states_dollar
	stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le dollar_united_states_dollar_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_1 & stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					dollar_united_states_dollar_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
				add = dollar_united_states_dollar_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_dollar_united_states_dollar = yes #?


		#stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1 bank owner & circulating_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
			}

			#circulating_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					dollar_united_states_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
					add = dollar_united_states_dollar_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_dollar_united_states_dollar & stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dollar_united_states_dollar_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_dollar_united_states_dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_dollar_united_states_dollar > 0
						export_to_dollar_united_states_dollar > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_dollar_united_states_dollar
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_dollar_united_states_dollar
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_dollar_united_states_dollar
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_dollar_united_states_dollar > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dollar_united_states_dollar
				add = import_in_dollar_united_states_dollar
			}
		}
		#all_dollar_united_states_dollar_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_dollar_united_states_dollar_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state  #var:stockpiling_dollar_united_states_dollar_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#eco_ariary
	stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le eco_ariary_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_1 & stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_eco_ariary_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_eco_ariary_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					eco_ariary_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
				add = eco_ariary_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_ariary_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_ariary_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_eco_ariary = yes #?


		#stockpiling_eco_ariary_state_1 bank owner & circulating_eco_ariary_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ariary_currency
			}

			#circulating_eco_ariary_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_eco_ariary_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					eco_ariary_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_ariary_c_var_2
					add = eco_ariary_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_ariary_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_ariary_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_eco_ariary_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_eco_ariary & stockpiling_eco_ariary_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_ariary_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_eco_ariary_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_eco_ariary
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_eco_ariary > 0
						export_to_eco_ariary > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_eco_ariary
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ariary_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_eco_ariary
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_eco_ariary
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_eco_ariary > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_eco_ariary
				add = import_in_eco_ariary
			}
		}
		#all_eco_ariary_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_eco_ariary_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_eco_ariary_state  #var:stockpiling_eco_ariary_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#eco_central_african_eco
	stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le eco_central_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_1 & stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					eco_central_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
				add = eco_central_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_eco_central_african_eco = yes #?


		#stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1 bank owner & circulating_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency
			}

			#circulating_eco_central_african_eco_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					eco_central_african_eco_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
					add = eco_central_african_eco_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_eco_central_african_eco & stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_central_african_eco_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_eco_central_african_eco
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_eco_central_african_eco > 0
						export_to_eco_central_african_eco > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_eco_central_african_eco
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_eco_central_african_eco
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_eco_central_african_eco
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_eco_central_african_eco > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_eco_central_african_eco
				add = import_in_eco_central_african_eco
			}
		}
		#all_eco_central_african_eco_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_eco_central_african_eco_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state  #var:stockpiling_eco_central_african_eco_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#eco_east_african_eco
	stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le eco_east_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_1 & stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					eco_east_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
				add = eco_east_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_eco_east_african_eco = yes #?


		#stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1 bank owner & circulating_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
			}

			#circulating_eco_east_african_eco_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					eco_east_african_eco_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
					add = eco_east_african_eco_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_eco_east_african_eco & stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_east_african_eco_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_eco_east_african_eco
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_eco_east_african_eco > 0
						export_to_eco_east_african_eco > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_eco_east_african_eco
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_eco_east_african_eco
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_eco_east_african_eco
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_eco_east_african_eco > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_eco_east_african_eco
				add = import_in_eco_east_african_eco
			}
		}
		#all_eco_east_african_eco_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_eco_east_african_eco_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state  #var:stockpiling_eco_east_african_eco_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#eco_ethiopian_birr
	stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le eco_ethiopian_birr_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1 & stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					eco_ethiopian_birr_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
				add = eco_ethiopian_birr_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_eco_ethiopian_birr = yes #?


		#stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1 bank owner & circulating_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
			}

			#circulating_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					eco_ethiopian_birr_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
					add = eco_ethiopian_birr_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_eco_ethiopian_birr & stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_ethiopian_birr_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_eco_ethiopian_birr
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_eco_ethiopian_birr > 0
						export_to_eco_ethiopian_birr > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_eco_ethiopian_birr
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_eco_ethiopian_birr
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_eco_ethiopian_birr
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_eco_ethiopian_birr > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_eco_ethiopian_birr
				add = import_in_eco_ethiopian_birr
			}
		}
		#all_eco_ethiopian_birr_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_eco_ethiopian_birr_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state  #var:stockpiling_eco_ethiopian_birr_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#eco_ghanaian_pound
	stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le eco_ghanaian_pound_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_1 & stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					eco_ghanaian_pound_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
				add = eco_ghanaian_pound_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_1
