				add = var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_eco_ghanaian_pound = yes #?


		#stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1 bank owner & circulating_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
			}

			#circulating_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					eco_ghanaian_pound_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
					add = eco_ghanaian_pound_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_eco_ghanaian_pound & stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_ghanaian_pound_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_eco_ghanaian_pound
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_eco_ghanaian_pound > 0
						export_to_eco_ghanaian_pound > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_eco_ghanaian_pound
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_eco_ghanaian_pound
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_eco_ghanaian_pound
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_eco_ghanaian_pound > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_eco_ghanaian_pound
				add = import_in_eco_ghanaian_pound
			}
		}
		#all_eco_ghanaian_pound_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_eco_ghanaian_pound_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state  #var:stockpiling_eco_ghanaian_pound_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#eco_nigerian_naira
	stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le eco_nigerian_naira_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_1 & stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					eco_nigerian_naira_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
				add = eco_nigerian_naira_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_eco_nigerian_naira = yes #?


		#stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1 bank owner & circulating_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
			}

			#circulating_eco_nigerian_naira_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					eco_nigerian_naira_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
					add = eco_nigerian_naira_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_eco_nigerian_naira & stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_nigerian_naira_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_eco_nigerian_naira
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_eco_nigerian_naira > 0
						export_to_eco_nigerian_naira > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_eco_nigerian_naira
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_eco_nigerian_naira
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_eco_nigerian_naira
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_eco_nigerian_naira > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_eco_nigerian_naira
				add = import_in_eco_nigerian_naira
			}
		}
		#all_eco_nigerian_naira_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_eco_nigerian_naira_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state  #var:stockpiling_eco_nigerian_naira_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#eco_south_african_rand
	stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le eco_south_african_rand_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_1 & stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					eco_south_african_rand_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
				add = eco_south_african_rand_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_eco_south_african_rand = yes #?


		#stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1 bank owner & circulating_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
			}

			#circulating_eco_south_african_rand_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					eco_south_african_rand_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
					add = eco_south_african_rand_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_eco_south_african_rand & stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_south_african_rand_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_eco_south_african_rand
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_eco_south_african_rand > 0
						export_to_eco_south_african_rand > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_eco_south_african_rand
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_eco_south_african_rand
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_eco_south_african_rand
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_eco_south_african_rand > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_eco_south_african_rand
				add = import_in_eco_south_african_rand
			}
		}
		#all_eco_south_african_rand_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_eco_south_african_rand_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state  #var:stockpiling_eco_south_african_rand_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#eco_tuareg_ouguiya
	stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1 & stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
				add = eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_eco_tuareg_ouguiya = yes #?


		#stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1 bank owner & circulating_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
			}

			#circulating_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
					add = eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_eco_tuareg_ouguiya & stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_eco_tuareg_ouguiya
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_eco_tuareg_ouguiya > 0
						export_to_eco_tuareg_ouguiya > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_eco_tuareg_ouguiya
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_eco_tuareg_ouguiya
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_eco_tuareg_ouguiya
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_eco_tuareg_ouguiya > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_eco_tuareg_ouguiya
				add = import_in_eco_tuareg_ouguiya
			}
		}
		#all_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state  #var:stockpiling_eco_tuareg_ouguiya_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#eco_west_african_eco
	stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le eco_west_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_1 & stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					eco_west_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
				add = eco_west_african_eco_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_eco_west_african_eco = yes #?


		#stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1 bank owner & circulating_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
			}

			#circulating_eco_west_african_eco_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					eco_west_african_eco_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
					add = eco_west_african_eco_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_eco_west_african_eco & stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_eco_west_african_eco
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_eco_west_african_eco > 0
						export_to_eco_west_african_eco > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_eco_west_african_eco
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_eco_west_african_eco
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_eco_west_african_eco
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_eco_west_african_eco > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_eco_west_african_eco
				add = import_in_eco_west_african_eco
			}
		}
		#all_eco_west_african_eco_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_eco_west_african_eco_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state  #var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#franc_belgian_franc
	stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le franc_belgian_franc_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_1 & stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					franc_belgian_franc_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
				add = franc_belgian_franc_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_franc_belgian_franc = yes #?


		#stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1 bank owner & circulating_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
			}

			#circulating_franc_belgian_franc_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					franc_belgian_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
					add = franc_belgian_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_franc_belgian_franc & stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_franc_belgian_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_franc_belgian_franc > 0
						export_to_franc_belgian_franc > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_franc_belgian_franc
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_franc_belgian_franc
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_franc_belgian_franc
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_franc_belgian_franc > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_franc_belgian_franc
				add = import_in_franc_belgian_franc
			}
		}
		#all_franc_belgian_franc_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_franc_belgian_franc_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state  #var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#franc_french_franc
	stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le franc_french_franc_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_1 & stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					franc_french_franc_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
				add = franc_french_franc_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_franc_french_franc = yes #?


		#stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1 bank owner & circulating_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency
			}

			#circulating_franc_french_franc_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					franc_french_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
					add = franc_french_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_franc_french_franc_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_franc_french_franc & stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_franc_french_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_franc_french_franc > 0
						export_to_franc_french_franc > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_franc_french_franc
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_franc_french_franc
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_franc_french_franc
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_franc_french_franc > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_franc_french_franc
				add = import_in_franc_french_franc
			}
		}
		#all_franc_french_franc_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_franc_french_franc_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state  #var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#franc_luxembourgish_franc
	stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1 & stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
				add = franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_franc_luxembourgish_franc = yes #?


		#stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1 bank owner & circulating_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
			}

			#circulating_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
					add = franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_franc_luxembourgish_franc & stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_franc_luxembourgish_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_franc_luxembourgish_franc > 0
						export_to_franc_luxembourgish_franc > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_franc_luxembourgish_franc
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_franc_luxembourgish_franc
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_franc_luxembourgish_franc
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_franc_luxembourgish_franc > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_franc_luxembourgish_franc
				add = import_in_franc_luxembourgish_franc
			}
		}
		#all_franc_luxembourgish_franc_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_franc_luxembourgish_franc_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state  #var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#franc_swiss_franc
	stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le franc_swiss_franc_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_1 & stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					franc_swiss_franc_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
				add = franc_swiss_franc_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_franc_swiss_franc = yes #?


		#stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1 bank owner & circulating_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
			}

			#circulating_franc_swiss_franc_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					franc_swiss_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
					add = franc_swiss_franc_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_franc_swiss_franc & stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_franc_swiss_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_franc_swiss_franc > 0
						export_to_franc_swiss_franc > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_franc_swiss_franc
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_franc_swiss_franc
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_franc_swiss_franc
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_franc_swiss_franc > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_franc_swiss_franc
				add = import_in_franc_swiss_franc
			}
		}
		#all_franc_swiss_franc_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_franc_swiss_franc_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state  #var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#gulden
	stockpiling_gulden_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le gulden_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1 & stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_gulden_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_gulden_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					gulden_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
				add = gulden_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_gulden = yes #?


		#stockpiling_gulden_state_1 bank owner & circulating_gulden_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
			}

			#circulating_gulden_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_gulden_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					gulden_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_gulden_c_var_2
					add = gulden_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_gulden_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_gulden_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_gulden_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_gulden_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_gulden & stockpiling_gulden_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_gulden_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_gulden > 0
						export_to_gulden > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_gulden
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_gulden
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_gulden
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_gulden > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_gulden
				add = import_in_gulden
			}
		}
		#all_gulden_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_gulden_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_gulden_state  #var:stockpiling_gulden_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#gulden_bavarian_gulden
	stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_1 & stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
				add = gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_gulden_bavarian_gulden = yes #?


		#stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1 bank owner & circulating_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
			}

			#circulating_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
					add = gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_gulden_bavarian_gulden & stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_bavarian_gulden_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_gulden_bavarian_gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_gulden_bavarian_gulden > 0
						export_to_gulden_bavarian_gulden > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_gulden_bavarian_gulden
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_gulden_bavarian_gulden
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_gulden_bavarian_gulden
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_gulden_bavarian_gulden > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_gulden_bavarian_gulden
				add = import_in_gulden_bavarian_gulden
			}
		}
		#all_gulden_bavarian_gulden_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_gulden_bavarian_gulden_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state  #var:stockpiling_gulden_bavarian_gulden_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#gulden_florin
	stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le gulden_florin_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_1 & stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_gulden_florin_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					gulden_florin_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
				add = gulden_florin_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_gulden_florin = yes #?


		#stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1 bank owner & circulating_gulden_florin_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
			}

			#circulating_gulden_florin_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_gulden_florin_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					gulden_florin_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_gulden_florin_c_var_2
					add = gulden_florin_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_gulden_florin_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_gulden_florin_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_gulden_florin_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_gulden_florin & stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_gulden_florin
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_gulden_florin > 0
						export_to_gulden_florin > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_gulden_florin
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_florin_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_gulden_florin
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_gulden_florin
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_gulden_florin > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_gulden_florin
				add = import_in_gulden_florin
			}
		}
		#all_gulden_florin_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_gulden_florin_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_gulden_florin_state  #var:stockpiling_gulden_florin_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#gulden_hungarian_forint
	stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le gulden_hungarian_forint_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_1 & stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					gulden_hungarian_forint_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
				add = gulden_hungarian_forint_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_gulden_hungarian_forint = yes #?


		#stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1 bank owner & circulating_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
			}

			#circulating_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					gulden_hungarian_forint_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
					add = gulden_hungarian_forint_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_gulden_hungarian_forint & stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_hungarian_forint_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_gulden_hungarian_forint
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_gulden_hungarian_forint > 0
						export_to_gulden_hungarian_forint > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_gulden_hungarian_forint
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_gulden_hungarian_forint
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_gulden_hungarian_forint
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_gulden_hungarian_forint > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_gulden_hungarian_forint
				add = import_in_gulden_hungarian_forint
			}
		}
		#all_gulden_hungarian_forint_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_gulden_hungarian_forint_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state  #var:stockpiling_gulden_hungarian_forint_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#gulden_indies_guilder
	stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le gulden_indies_guilder_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_1 & stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state
		}
		change_variable = {
