			name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					gulden_indies_guilder_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
				add = gulden_indies_guilder_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_gulden_indies_guilder = yes #?


		#stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1 bank owner & circulating_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency
			}

			#circulating_gulden_indies_guilder_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					gulden_indies_guilder_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
					add = gulden_indies_guilder_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_gulden_indies_guilder & stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_indies_guilder_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_gulden_indies_guilder
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_gulden_indies_guilder > 0
						export_to_gulden_indies_guilder > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_gulden_indies_guilder
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_gulden_indies_guilder
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_gulden_indies_guilder
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_gulden_indies_guilder > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_gulden_indies_guilder
				add = import_in_gulden_indies_guilder
			}
		}
		#all_gulden_indies_guilder_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_gulden_indies_guilder_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state  #var:stockpiling_gulden_indies_guilder_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#gulden_south_german_gulden
	stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le gulden_south_german_gulden_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_1 & stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					gulden_south_german_gulden_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
				add = gulden_south_german_gulden_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_gulden_south_german_gulden = yes #?


		#stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1 bank owner & circulating_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
			}

			#circulating_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					gulden_south_german_gulden_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
					add = gulden_south_german_gulden_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_gulden_south_german_gulden & stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gulden_south_german_gulden_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_gulden_south_german_gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_gulden_south_german_gulden > 0
						export_to_gulden_south_german_gulden > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_gulden_south_german_gulden
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_gulden_south_german_gulden
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_gulden_south_german_gulden
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_gulden_south_german_gulden > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_gulden_south_german_gulden
				add = import_in_gulden_south_german_gulden
			}
		}
		#all_gulden_south_german_gulden_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_gulden_south_german_gulden_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state  #var:stockpiling_gulden_south_german_gulden_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#krone_czech_koruna
	stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le krone_czech_koruna_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_1 & stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					krone_czech_koruna_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
				add = krone_czech_koruna_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_krone_czech_koruna = yes #?


		#stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1 bank owner & circulating_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
			}

			#circulating_krone_czech_koruna_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					krone_czech_koruna_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
					add = krone_czech_koruna_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_krone_czech_koruna & stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_czech_koruna_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_krone_czech_koruna
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_krone_czech_koruna > 0
						export_to_krone_czech_koruna > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_krone_czech_koruna
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_krone_czech_koruna
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_krone_czech_koruna
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_krone_czech_koruna > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_krone_czech_koruna
				add = import_in_krone_czech_koruna
			}
		}
		#all_krone_czech_koruna_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_krone_czech_koruna_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state  #var:stockpiling_krone_czech_koruna_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#krone_danish_krone
	stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le krone_danish_krone_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_1 & stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

			name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve

				or = {

			}

				add = krone_danish_krone_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_krone_danish_krone = yes #?


		#stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1 bank owner & circulating_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
			}

			#circulating_krone_danish_krone_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					krone_danish_krone_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
					add = krone_danish_krone_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_krone_danish_krone_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_krone_danish_krone & stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_danish_krone_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_krone_danish_krone
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_krone_danish_krone > 0
						export_to_krone_danish_krone > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_krone_danish_krone
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_krone_danish_krone
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_krone_danish_krone
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_krone_danish_krone > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_krone_danish_krone
				add = import_in_krone_danish_krone
			}
		}
		#all_krone_danish_krone_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_krone_danish_krone_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state  #var:stockpiling_krone_danish_krone_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#krone_estonian_kroon
	stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le krone_estonian_kroon_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_1 & stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					krone_estonian_kroon_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
				add = krone_estonian_kroon_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_estonian_kroon_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_estonian_kroon_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_krone_estonian_kroon = yes #?


		#stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1 bank owner & circulating_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_estonian_kroon_currency
			}

			#circulating_krone_estonian_kroon_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					krone_estonian_kroon_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
					add = krone_estonian_kroon_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_krone_estonian_kroon & stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_estonian_kroon_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_krone_estonian_kroon
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_krone_estonian_kroon > 0
						export_to_krone_estonian_kroon > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_krone_estonian_kroon
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_krone_estonian_kroon
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_krone_estonian_kroon
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_krone_estonian_kroon > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_krone_estonian_kroon
				add = import_in_krone_estonian_kroon
			}
		}
		#all_krone_estonian_kroon_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_krone_estonian_kroon_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state  #var:stockpiling_krone_estonian_kroon_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#krone_icelandic_krona
	stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le krone_icelandic_krona_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_1 & stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					krone_icelandic_krona_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
				add = krone_icelandic_krona_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_icelandic_krona_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_icelandic_krona_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_krone_icelandic_krona = yes #?


		#stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1 bank owner & circulating_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_icelandic_krona_currency
			}

			#circulating_krone_icelandic_krona_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					krone_icelandic_krona_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
					add = krone_icelandic_krona_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_krone_icelandic_krona & stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_icelandic_krona_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_krone_icelandic_krona
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_krone_icelandic_krona > 0
						export_to_krone_icelandic_krona > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_krone_icelandic_krona
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_krone_icelandic_krona
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_krone_icelandic_krona
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_krone_icelandic_krona > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_krone_icelandic_krona
				add = import_in_krone_icelandic_krona
			}
		}
		#all_krone_icelandic_krona_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_krone_icelandic_krona_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state  #var:stockpiling_krone_icelandic_krona_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#krone_norwegian_krone
	stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le krone_norwegian_krone_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_1 & stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					krone_norwegian_krone_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
				add = krone_norwegian_krone_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_norwegian_krone_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_norwegian_krone_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_krone_norwegian_krone = yes #?


		#stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state_1 bank owner & circulating_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_norwegian_krone_currency
			}

			#circulating_krone_norwegian_krone_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					krone_norwegian_krone_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
					add = krone_norwegian_krone_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_krone_norwegian_krone & stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_norwegian_krone_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_krone_norwegian_krone
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_krone_norwegian_krone > 0
						export_to_krone_norwegian_krone > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_krone_norwegian_krone
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_krone_norwegian_krone
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_krone_norwegian_krone
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_krone_norwegian_krone > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_krone_norwegian_krone
				add = import_in_krone_norwegian_krone
			}
		}
		#all_krone_norwegian_krone_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_krone_norwegian_krone_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state  #var:stockpiling_krone_norwegian_krone_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#krone_slovak_koruna
	stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le krone_slovak_koruna_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_1 & stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					krone_slovak_koruna_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
				add = krone_slovak_koruna_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_slovak_koruna_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_slovak_koruna_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_krone_slovak_koruna = yes #?


		#stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state_1 bank owner & circulating_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_slovak_koruna_currency
			}

			#circulating_krone_slovak_koruna_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					krone_slovak_koruna_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
					add = krone_slovak_koruna_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_krone_slovak_koruna & stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_slovak_koruna_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_krone_slovak_koruna
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_krone_slovak_koruna > 0
						export_to_krone_slovak_koruna > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_krone_slovak_koruna
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_krone_slovak_koruna
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_krone_slovak_koruna
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_krone_slovak_koruna > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_krone_slovak_koruna
				add = import_in_krone_slovak_koruna
			}
		}
		#all_krone_slovak_koruna_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_krone_slovak_koruna_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state  #var:stockpiling_krone_slovak_koruna_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#krone_swedish_krona
	stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le krone_swedish_krona_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_1 & stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					krone_swedish_krona_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
				add = krone_swedish_krona_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_swedish_krona_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_swedish_krona_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_krone_swedish_krona = yes #?


		#stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state_1 bank owner & circulating_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_krone_swedish_krona_currency
			}

			#circulating_krone_swedish_krona_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					krone_swedish_krona_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
					add = krone_swedish_krona_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_krone_swedish_krona & stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_krone_swedish_krona_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_krone_swedish_krona
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_krone_swedish_krona > 0
						export_to_krone_swedish_krona > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_krone_swedish_krona
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_krone_swedish_krona
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_krone_swedish_krona
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_krone_swedish_krona > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_krone_swedish_krona
				add = import_in_krone_swedish_krona
			}
		}
		#all_krone_swedish_krona_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_krone_swedish_krona_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state  #var:stockpiling_krone_swedish_krona_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#leon_leu
	stockpiling_leon_leu_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le leon_leu_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_1 & stockpiling_leon_leu_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_leon_leu_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_leon_leu_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_leon_leu_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					leon_leu_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_2
				add = leon_leu_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_leon_leu_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_leon_leu_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_leon_leu = yes #?


		#stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1 bank owner & circulating_leon_leu_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_leon_leu_currency
			}

			#circulating_leon_leu_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_leon_leu_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					leon_leu_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_leon_leu_c_var_2
					add = leon_leu_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_leon_leu_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_leon_leu_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_leon_leu_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_leon_leu_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_leon_leu & stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_leon_leu_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_leon_leu
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_leon_leu > 0
						export_to_leon_leu > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_leon_leu_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_leon_leu_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_leon_leu
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_leon_leu_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_leon_leu_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leon_leu_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_leon_leu
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_leon_leu
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_leon_leu > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_leon_leu
				add = import_in_leon_leu
			}
		}
		#all_leon_leu_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_leon_leu_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_leon_leu_state  #var:stockpiling_leon_leu_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#leon_lev
	stockpiling_leon_lev_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le leon_lev_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_1 & stockpiling_leon_lev_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_leon_lev_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_leon_lev_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_leon_lev_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					leon_lev_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_2
				add = leon_lev_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_leon_lev_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_leon_lev_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_leon_lev = yes #?


		#stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1 bank owner & circulating_leon_lev_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_leon_lev_currency
			}

			#circulating_leon_lev_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_leon_lev_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					leon_lev_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_leon_lev_c_var_2
					add = leon_lev_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_leon_lev_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_leon_lev_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_leon_lev_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_leon_lev_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_leon_lev & stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_leon_lev_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_leon_lev
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_leon_lev > 0
						export_to_leon_lev > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_leon_lev_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_leon_lev_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_leon_lev
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_leon_lev_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_leon_lev_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_leon_lev_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_leon_lev
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_leon_lev
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_leon_lev > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_leon_lev
				add = import_in_leon_lev
			}
		}
		#all_leon_lev_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_leon_lev_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_leon_lev_state  #var:stockpiling_leon_lev_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#lira
	stockpiling_lira_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le lira_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_lira_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_lira_c_var_1 & stockpiling_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_lira_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_lira_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_lira_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					lira_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
				add = lira_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_lira = yes #?


		#stockpiling_lira_state_1 bank owner & circulating_lira_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
			}

			#circulating_lira_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_lira_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_lira_c_var_2
					add = lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_lira_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_lira_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_lira_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_lira_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_lira_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_lira & stockpiling_lira_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_lira_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_lira_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_lira > 0
						export_to_lira > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_lira_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_lira
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_lira
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_lira
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_lira > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_lira
				add = import_in_lira
			}
		}
		#all_lira_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_lira_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_lira_state  #var:stockpiling_lira_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#lira_ducato
	stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le lira_ducato_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_1 & stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_lira_ducato_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_lira_ducato_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					lira_ducato_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_2
				add = lira_ducato_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_ducato_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_ducato_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_lira_ducato = yes #?


		#stockpiling_lira_ducato_state_1 bank owner & circulating_lira_ducato_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_ducato_currency
			}

			#circulating_lira_ducato_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_lira_ducato_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					lira_ducato_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_lira_ducato_c_var_2
					add = lira_ducato_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_lira_ducato_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_lira_ducato_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_lira_ducato_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_lira_ducato & stockpiling_lira_ducato_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_ducato_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_lira_ducato_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_lira_ducato
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_lira_ducato > 0
						export_to_lira_ducato > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_lira_ducato
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_ducato_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_lira_ducato
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_lira_ducato
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_lira_ducato > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_lira_ducato
				add = import_in_lira_ducato
			}
		}
		#all_lira_ducato_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_lira_ducato_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_lira_ducato_state  #var:stockpiling_lira_ducato_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#lira_ottoman_lira
	stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le lira_ottoman_lira_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_1 & stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					lira_ottoman_lira_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
				add = lira_ottoman_lira_c_market_goods_delta
			}
