			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_ottoman_lira_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_ottoman_lira_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_lira_ottoman_lira = yes #?


		#stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state_1 bank owner & circulating_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_ottoman_lira_currency
			}

			#circulating_lira_ottoman_lira_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					lira_ottoman_lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
					add = lira_ottoman_lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_lira_ottoman_lira & stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_ottoman_lira_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_lira_ottoman_lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_lira_ottoman_lira > 0
						export_to_lira_ottoman_lira > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_lira_ottoman_lira
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_lira_ottoman_lira
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_lira_ottoman_lira
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_lira_ottoman_lira > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_lira_ottoman_lira
				add = import_in_lira_ottoman_lira
			}
		}
		#all_lira_ottoman_lira_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_lira_ottoman_lira_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state  #var:stockpiling_lira_ottoman_lira_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#lira_scudo_pontificio
	stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le lira_scudo_pontificio_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_1 & stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					lira_scudo_pontificio_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
				add = lira_scudo_pontificio_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_pontificio_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_pontificio_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_lira_scudo_pontificio = yes #?


		#stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state_1 bank owner & circulating_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_pontificio_currency
			}

			#circulating_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					lira_scudo_pontificio_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
					add = lira_scudo_pontificio_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_lira_scudo_pontificio & stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_pontificio_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_lira_scudo_pontificio
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_lira_scudo_pontificio > 0
						export_to_lira_scudo_pontificio > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_lira_scudo_pontificio
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_lira_scudo_pontificio
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_lira_scudo_pontificio
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_lira_scudo_pontificio > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_lira_scudo_pontificio
				add = import_in_lira_scudo_pontificio
			}
		}
		#all_lira_scudo_pontificio_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_lira_scudo_pontificio_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state  #var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_pontificio_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#lira_scudo_sardo
	stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le lira_scudo_sardo_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_1 & stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					lira_scudo_sardo_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
				add = lira_scudo_sardo_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_lira_scudo_sardo = yes #?


		#stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1 bank owner & circulating_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
			}

			#circulating_lira_scudo_sardo_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					lira_scudo_sardo_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
					add = lira_scudo_sardo_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_lira_scudo_sardo & stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_scudo_sardo_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_lira_scudo_sardo
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_lira_scudo_sardo > 0
						export_to_lira_scudo_sardo > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_lira_scudo_sardo
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_lira_scudo_sardo
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_lira_scudo_sardo
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_lira_scudo_sardo > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_lira_scudo_sardo
				add = import_in_lira_scudo_sardo
			}
		}
		#all_lira_scudo_sardo_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_lira_scudo_sardo_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state  #var:stockpiling_lira_scudo_sardo_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#lira_toscane_lira
	stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le lira_toscane_lira_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_1 & stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					lira_toscane_lira_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
				add = lira_toscane_lira_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_lira_toscane_lira = yes #?


		#stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1 bank owner & circulating_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
			}

			#circulating_lira_toscane_lira_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					lira_toscane_lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
					add = lira_toscane_lira_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_lira_toscane_lira & stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_lira_toscane_lira_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_lira_toscane_lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_lira_toscane_lira > 0
						export_to_lira_toscane_lira > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_lira_toscane_lira
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_lira_toscane_lira
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_lira_toscane_lira
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_lira_toscane_lira > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_lira_toscane_lira
				add = import_in_lira_toscane_lira
			}
		}
		#all_lira_toscane_lira_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_lira_toscane_lira_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state  #var:stockpiling_lira_toscane_lira_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#mark
	stockpiling_mark_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le mark_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_mark_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_mark_c_var_1 & stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_mark_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_mark_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					mark_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
				add = mark_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_mark = yes #?


		#stockpiling_mark_state_1 bank owner & circulating_mark_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
			}

			#circulating_mark_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_mark_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					mark_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_mark_c_var_2
					add = mark_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_mark_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_mark_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_mark_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_mark_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_mark_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_mark & stockpiling_mark_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_mark_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_mark_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_mark > 0
						export_to_mark > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_mark_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_mark
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_mark
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_mark
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_mark > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_mark
				add = import_in_mark
			}
		}
		#all_mark_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_mark_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_mark_state  #var:stockpiling_mark_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#mark_finnish_markka
	stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le mark_finnish_markka_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_1 & stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					mark_finnish_markka_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
				add = mark_finnish_markka_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_mark_finnish_markka = yes #?


		#stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1 bank owner & circulating_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
			}

			#circulating_mark_finnish_markka_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					mark_finnish_markka_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
					add = mark_finnish_markka_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_mark_finnish_markka & stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_mark_finnish_markka_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_mark_finnish_markka
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_mark_finnish_markka > 0
						export_to_mark_finnish_markka > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_mark_finnish_markka
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_mark_finnish_markka
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_mark_finnish_markka
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_mark_finnish_markka > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_mark_finnish_markka
				add = import_in_mark_finnish_markka
			}
		}
		#all_mark_finnish_markka_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_mark_finnish_markka_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state  #var:stockpiling_mark_finnish_markka_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#peso
	stockpiling_peso_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le peso_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_peso_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_peso_c_var_1 & stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_peso_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_peso_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
				add = peso_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_peso = yes #?


		#stockpiling_peso_state_1 bank owner & circulating_peso_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
			}

			#circulating_peso_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_peso_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_c_var_2
					add = peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_peso_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_peso_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_peso & stockpiling_peso_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_peso_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_peso > 0
						export_to_peso > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_peso
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_peso
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_peso
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_peso
				add = import_in_peso
			}
		}
		#all_peso_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_peso_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_peso_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#peso_argentine_peso
	stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le peso_argentine_peso_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_1 & stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					peso_argentine_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
				add = peso_argentine_peso_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_peso_argentine_peso = yes #?


		#stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1 bank owner & circulating_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
			}

			#circulating_peso_argentine_peso_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					peso_argentine_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
					add = peso_argentine_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_peso_argentine_peso & stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_argentine_peso_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_peso_argentine_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_peso_argentine_peso > 0
						export_to_peso_argentine_peso > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_peso_argentine_peso
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_peso_argentine_peso
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_peso_argentine_peso
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_peso_argentine_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_argentine_peso
				add = import_in_peso_argentine_peso
			}
		}
		#all_peso_argentine_peso_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_peso_argentine_peso_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_argentine_peso_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#peso_bolivien_peso
	stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le peso_bolivien_peso_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_1 & stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					peso_bolivien_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
				add = peso_bolivien_peso_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_peso_bolivien_peso = yes #?


		#stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1 bank owner & circulating_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
			}

			#circulating_peso_bolivien_peso_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					peso_bolivien_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
					add = peso_bolivien_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_peso_bolivien_peso & stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_bolivien_peso_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_peso_bolivien_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_peso_bolivien_peso > 0
						export_to_peso_bolivien_peso > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_peso_bolivien_peso
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_peso_bolivien_peso
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_peso_bolivien_peso
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_peso_bolivien_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_bolivien_peso
				add = import_in_peso_bolivien_peso
			}
		}
		#all_peso_bolivien_peso_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_peso_bolivien_peso_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_bolivien_peso_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#peso_chilean_peso
	stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le peso_chilean_peso_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_1 & stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					peso_chilean_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
				add = peso_chilean_peso_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_peso_chilean_peso = yes #?


		#stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1 bank owner & circulating_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
			}

			#circulating_peso_chilean_peso_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					peso_chilean_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
					add = peso_chilean_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_peso_chilean_peso & stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_peso_chilean_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_peso_chilean_peso > 0
						export_to_peso_chilean_peso > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_peso_chilean_peso
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_peso_chilean_peso
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_peso_chilean_peso
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_peso_chilean_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_chilean_peso
				add = import_in_peso_chilean_peso
			}
		}
		#all_peso_chilean_peso_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_peso_chilean_peso_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_chilean_peso_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#peso_colombian_peso
	stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le peso_colombian_peso_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_1 & stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					peso_colombian_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
				add = peso_colombian_peso_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_peso_colombian_peso = yes #?


		#stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1 bank owner & circulating_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
			}

			#circulating_peso_colombian_peso_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					peso_colombian_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
					add = peso_colombian_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_peso_colombian_peso & stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_colombian_peso_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_peso_colombian_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_peso_colombian_peso > 0
						export_to_peso_colombian_peso > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_peso_colombian_peso
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_peso_colombian_peso
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_peso_colombian_peso
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_peso_colombian_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_colombian_peso
				add = import_in_peso_colombian_peso
			}
		}
		#all_peso_colombian_peso_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_peso_colombian_peso_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_colombian_peso_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#peso_costa_rican_colon
	stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le peso_costa_rican_colon_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_1 & stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					peso_costa_rican_colon_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
				add = peso_costa_rican_colon_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_peso_costa_rican_colon = yes #?


		#stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1 bank owner & circulating_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
			}

			#circulating_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					peso_costa_rican_colon_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
					add = peso_costa_rican_colon_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_peso_costa_rican_colon & stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_costa_rican_colon_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_peso_costa_rican_colon
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_peso_costa_rican_colon > 0
						export_to_peso_costa_rican_colon > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_peso_costa_rican_colon
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_peso_costa_rican_colon
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_peso_costa_rican_colon
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_peso_costa_rican_colon > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_costa_rican_colon
				add = import_in_peso_costa_rican_colon
			}
		}
		#all_peso_costa_rican_colon_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_peso_costa_rican_colon_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_costa_rican_colon_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#peso_cuban_peso
	stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le peso_cuban_peso_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_1 & stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					peso_cuban_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
				add = peso_cuban_peso_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_peso_cuban_peso = yes #?


		#stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1 bank owner & circulating_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
			}

			#circulating_peso_cuban_peso_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					peso_cuban_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
					add = peso_cuban_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_peso_cuban_peso & stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_cuban_peso_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_peso_cuban_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_peso_cuban_peso > 0
						export_to_peso_cuban_peso > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_peso_cuban_peso
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_peso_cuban_peso
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_peso_cuban_peso
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_peso_cuban_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_cuban_peso
				add = import_in_peso_cuban_peso
			}
		}
		#all_peso_cuban_peso_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_peso_cuban_peso_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_cuban_peso_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#peso_ecuadorian_peso
	stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1 & stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
				add = peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
