					has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_peso_ecuadorian_peso = yes #?


		#stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1 bank owner & circulating_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
			}

			#circulating_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
					add = peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_peso_ecuadorian_peso & stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_ecuadorian_peso_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_peso_ecuadorian_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_peso_ecuadorian_peso > 0
						export_to_peso_ecuadorian_peso > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_peso_ecuadorian_peso
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_peso_ecuadorian_peso
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_peso_ecuadorian_peso
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_peso_ecuadorian_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_ecuadorian_peso
				add = import_in_peso_ecuadorian_peso
			}
		}
		#all_peso_ecuadorian_peso_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_peso_ecuadorian_peso_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_ecuadorian_peso_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#peso_el_salvador_colon
	stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le peso_el_salvador_colon_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_1 & stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					peso_el_salvador_colon_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2
				add = peso_el_salvador_colon_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_el_salvador_colon_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_el_salvador_colon_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_peso_el_salvador_colon = yes #?


		#stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state_1 bank owner & circulating_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_el_salvador_colon_currency
			}

			#circulating_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					peso_el_salvador_colon_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2
					add = peso_el_salvador_colon_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_peso_el_salvador_colon & stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_el_salvador_colon_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_peso_el_salvador_colon
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_peso_el_salvador_colon > 0
						export_to_peso_el_salvador_colon > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_peso_el_salvador_colon
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_peso_el_salvador_colon
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_peso_el_salvador_colon
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_peso_el_salvador_colon > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_el_salvador_colon
				add = import_in_peso_el_salvador_colon
			}
		}
		#all_peso_el_salvador_colon_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_peso_el_salvador_colon_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_el_salvador_colon_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#peso_guatemalan_quetzal
	stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_1 & stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
				add = peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_peso_guatemalan_quetzal = yes #?


		#stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1 bank owner & circulating_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
			}

			#circulating_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
					add = peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_peso_guatemalan_quetzal & stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_peso_guatemalan_quetzal
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_peso_guatemalan_quetzal > 0
						export_to_peso_guatemalan_quetzal > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_peso_guatemalan_quetzal
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_peso_guatemalan_quetzal
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_peso_guatemalan_quetzal
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_peso_guatemalan_quetzal > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_guatemalan_quetzal
				add = import_in_peso_guatemalan_quetzal
			}
		}
		#all_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_guatemalan_quetzal_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#peso_honduran_lempira
	stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le peso_honduran_lempira_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_1 & stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					peso_honduran_lempira_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
				add = peso_honduran_lempira_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_honduran_lempira_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_honduran_lempira_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_peso_honduran_lempira = yes #?


		#stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state_1 bank owner & circulating_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_honduran_lempira_currency
			}

			#circulating_peso_honduran_lempira_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					peso_honduran_lempira_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
					add = peso_honduran_lempira_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_peso_honduran_lempira & stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_honduran_lempira_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_peso_honduran_lempira
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_peso_honduran_lempira > 0
						export_to_peso_honduran_lempira > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_peso_honduran_lempira
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_peso_honduran_lempira
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_peso_honduran_lempira
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_peso_honduran_lempira > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_honduran_lempira
				add = import_in_peso_honduran_lempira
			}
		}
		#all_peso_honduran_lempira_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_peso_honduran_lempira_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_honduran_lempira_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#peso_mexican_peso
	stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le peso_mexican_peso_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_1 & stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					peso_mexican_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
				add = peso_mexican_peso_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_mexican_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_mexican_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_peso_mexican_peso = yes #?


		#stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1 bank owner & circulating_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_mexican_peso_currency
			}

			#circulating_peso_mexican_peso_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					peso_mexican_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
					add = peso_mexican_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_peso_mexican_peso & stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_mexican_peso_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_peso_mexican_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_peso_mexican_peso > 0
						export_to_peso_mexican_peso > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_peso_mexican_peso
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_peso_mexican_peso
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_peso_mexican_peso
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_peso_mexican_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_mexican_peso
				add = import_in_peso_mexican_peso
			}
		}
		#all_peso_mexican_peso_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_peso_mexican_peso_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_mexican_peso_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
	stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_1 & stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
				add = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba = yes #?


		#stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1 bank owner & circulating_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
			}

			#circulating_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
					add = peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba & stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba > 0
						export_to_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
				add = import_in_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba
			}
		}
		#all_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_nicaraguan_cordoba_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#peso_paraguayan_peso
	stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le peso_paraguayan_peso_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_1 & stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					peso_paraguayan_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2
				add = peso_paraguayan_peso_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_peso_paraguayan_peso = yes #?


		#stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1 bank owner & circulating_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency
			}

			#circulating_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					peso_paraguayan_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2
					add = peso_paraguayan_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_peso_paraguayan_peso & stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_paraguayan_peso_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_peso_paraguayan_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_peso_paraguayan_peso > 0
						export_to_peso_paraguayan_peso > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_peso_paraguayan_peso
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_peso_paraguayan_peso
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_peso_paraguayan_peso
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_peso_paraguayan_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_paraguayan_peso
				add = import_in_peso_paraguayan_peso
			}
		}
		#all_peso_paraguayan_peso_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_peso_paraguayan_peso_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_paraguayan_peso_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#peso_philippine_peso
	stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le peso_philippine_peso_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_1 & stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					peso_philippine_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
				add = peso_philippine_peso_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_philippine_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_philippine_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_peso_philippine_peso = yes #?


		#stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state_1 bank owner & circulating_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_philippine_peso_currency
			}

			#circulating_peso_philippine_peso_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					peso_philippine_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
					add = peso_philippine_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_peso_philippine_peso & stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_philippine_peso_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_peso_philippine_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_peso_philippine_peso > 0
						export_to_peso_philippine_peso > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_peso_philippine_peso
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_peso_philippine_peso
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_peso_philippine_peso
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_peso_philippine_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_philippine_peso
				add = import_in_peso_philippine_peso
			}
		}
		#all_peso_philippine_peso_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_peso_philippine_peso_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_philippine_peso_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#peso_sol_de_oro
	stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le peso_sol_de_oro_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_1 & stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					peso_sol_de_oro_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
				add = peso_sol_de_oro_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_sol_de_oro_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_sol_de_oro_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_peso_sol_de_oro = yes #?


		#stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state_1 bank owner & circulating_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_sol_de_oro_currency
			}

			#circulating_peso_sol_de_oro_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					peso_sol_de_oro_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
					add = peso_sol_de_oro_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_peso_sol_de_oro & stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_sol_de_oro_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_peso_sol_de_oro
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_peso_sol_de_oro > 0
						export_to_peso_sol_de_oro > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_peso_sol_de_oro
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_peso_sol_de_oro
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_peso_sol_de_oro
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_peso_sol_de_oro > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_sol_de_oro
				add = import_in_peso_sol_de_oro
			}
		}
		#all_peso_sol_de_oro_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_peso_sol_de_oro_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_sol_de_oro_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#peso_uruguayan_peso
	stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le peso_uruguayan_peso_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_1 & stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					peso_uruguayan_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
				add = peso_uruguayan_peso_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_uruguayan_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_uruguayan_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_peso_uruguayan_peso = yes #?


		#stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state_1 bank owner & circulating_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_uruguayan_peso_currency
			}

			#circulating_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					peso_uruguayan_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
					add = peso_uruguayan_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_peso_uruguayan_peso & stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_uruguayan_peso_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_peso_uruguayan_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_peso_uruguayan_peso > 0
						export_to_peso_uruguayan_peso > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_peso_uruguayan_peso
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_peso_uruguayan_peso
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_peso_uruguayan_peso
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_peso_uruguayan_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_uruguayan_peso
				add = import_in_peso_uruguayan_peso
			}
		}
		#all_peso_uruguayan_peso_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_peso_uruguayan_peso_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_uruguayan_peso_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#peso_venezuelan_peso
	stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le peso_venezuelan_peso_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_1 & stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					peso_venezuelan_peso_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
				add = peso_venezuelan_peso_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_venezuelan_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_venezuelan_peso_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_peso_venezuelan_peso = yes #?


		#stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state_1 bank owner & circulating_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_venezuelan_peso_currency
			}

			#circulating_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					peso_venezuelan_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
					add = peso_venezuelan_peso_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_peso_venezuelan_peso & stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_peso_venezuelan_peso_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_peso_venezuelan_peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_peso_venezuelan_peso > 0
						export_to_peso_venezuelan_peso > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_peso_venezuelan_peso
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_peso_venezuelan_peso
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_peso_venezuelan_peso
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_peso_venezuelan_peso > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_venezuelan_peso
				add = import_in_peso_venezuelan_peso
			}
		}
		#all_peso_venezuelan_peso_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_peso_venezuelan_peso_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state  #var:stockpiling_peso_venezuelan_peso_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#pound_egyptian_pound
	stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le pound_egyptian_pound_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_1 & stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					pound_egyptian_pound_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
				add = pound_egyptian_pound_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_pound_egyptian_pound_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_pound_egyptian_pound_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_pound_egyptian_pound = yes #?


		#stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state_1 bank owner & circulating_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_egyptian_pound_currency
			}

			#circulating_pound_egyptian_pound_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					pound_egyptian_pound_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
					add = pound_egyptian_pound_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_pound_egyptian_pound & stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_pound_egyptian_pound_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_pound_egyptian_pound
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_pound_egyptian_pound > 0
						export_to_pound_egyptian_pound > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_pound_egyptian_pound
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_pound_egyptian_pound
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_pound_egyptian_pound
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_pound_egyptian_pound > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_pound_egyptian_pound
				add = import_in_pound_egyptian_pound
			}
		}
		#all_pound_egyptian_pound_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_pound_egyptian_pound_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state  #var:stockpiling_pound_egyptian_pound_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#pound_irish_pound
	stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le pound_irish_pound_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_1 & stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					pound_irish_pound_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
				add = pound_irish_pound_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_pound_irish_pound = yes #?


		#stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state_1 bank owner & circulating_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
			}

			#circulating_pound_irish_pound_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					pound_irish_pound_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
					add = pound_irish_pound_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_pound_irish_pound_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_pound_irish_pound & stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_pound_irish_pound_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_pound_irish_pound
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_pound_irish_pound > 0
						export_to_pound_irish_pound > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_pound_irish_pound
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_pound_irish_pound
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_pound_irish_pound
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_pound_irish_pound > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_pound_irish_pound
				add = import_in_pound_irish_pound
			}
		}
		#all_pound_irish_pound_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_pound_irish_pound_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state  #var:stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#pound_sterling
	stockpiling_pound_sterling_c_1 = {
