		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					spe_latvian_lats_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
				add = spe_latvian_lats_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_latvian_lats_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_latvian_lats_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_spe_latvian_lats = yes #?


		#stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state_1 bank owner & circulating_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_latvian_lats_currency
			}

			#circulating_spe_latvian_lats_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					spe_latvian_lats_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
					add = spe_latvian_lats_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_spe_latvian_lats & stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_latvian_lats_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_spe_latvian_lats
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_spe_latvian_lats > 0
						export_to_spe_latvian_lats > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_spe_latvian_lats
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_spe_latvian_lats
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_spe_latvian_lats
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_spe_latvian_lats > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_spe_latvian_lats
				add = import_in_spe_latvian_lats
			}
		}
		#all_spe_latvian_lats_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_spe_latvian_lats_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state  #var:stockpiling_spe_latvian_lats_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#spe_lithuanian_litas
	stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le spe_lithuanian_litas_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1 & stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					spe_lithuanian_litas_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
				add = spe_lithuanian_litas_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_lithuanian_litas_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_lithuanian_litas_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_spe_lithuanian_litas = yes #?


		#stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1 bank owner & circulating_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_lithuanian_litas_currency
			}

			#circulating_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					spe_lithuanian_litas_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
					add = spe_lithuanian_litas_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_spe_lithuanian_litas & stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_lithuanian_litas_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_spe_lithuanian_litas
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_spe_lithuanian_litas > 0
						export_to_spe_lithuanian_litas > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_spe_lithuanian_litas
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_spe_lithuanian_litas
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_spe_lithuanian_litas
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_spe_lithuanian_litas > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_spe_lithuanian_litas
				add = import_in_spe_lithuanian_litas
			}
		}
		#all_spe_lithuanian_litas_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_spe_lithuanian_litas_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state  #var:stockpiling_spe_lithuanian_litas_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#spe_peseta
	stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le spe_peseta_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_var_1 & stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_spe_peseta_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_spe_peseta_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					spe_peseta_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_var_2
				add = spe_peseta_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_peseta_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_peseta_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_spe_peseta = yes #?


		#stockpiling_spe_peseta_state_1 bank owner & circulating_spe_peseta_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_peseta_currency
			}

			#circulating_spe_peseta_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_spe_peseta_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					spe_peseta_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_peseta_c_var_2
					add = spe_peseta_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_peseta_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_peseta_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_spe_peseta_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_spe_peseta & stockpiling_spe_peseta_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_peseta_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_spe_peseta_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_spe_peseta
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_spe_peseta > 0
						export_to_spe_peseta > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_spe_peseta
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_peseta_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_spe_peseta
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_spe_peseta
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_spe_peseta > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_spe_peseta
				add = import_in_spe_peseta
			}
		}
		#all_spe_peseta_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_spe_peseta_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_spe_peseta_state  #var:stockpiling_spe_peseta_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#spe_ruble
	stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le spe_ruble_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_var_1 & stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_spe_ruble_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					spe_ruble_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_var_2
				add = spe_ruble_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_ruble_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_ruble_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_spe_ruble = yes #?


		#stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1 bank owner & circulating_spe_ruble_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_ruble_currency
			}

			#circulating_spe_ruble_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_spe_ruble_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					spe_ruble_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_ruble_c_var_2
					add = spe_ruble_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_ruble_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_ruble_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_spe_ruble_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_spe_ruble & stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_ruble_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_spe_ruble
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_spe_ruble > 0
						export_to_spe_ruble > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_spe_ruble
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_ruble_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_spe_ruble
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_spe_ruble
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_spe_ruble > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_spe_ruble
				add = import_in_spe_ruble
			}
		}
		#all_spe_ruble_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_spe_ruble_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_spe_ruble_state  #var:stockpiling_spe_ruble_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#spe_uni
	stockpiling_spe_uni_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le spe_uni_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_spe_uni_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_spe_uni_c_var_1 & stockpiling_spe_uni_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_spe_uni_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_uni_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_spe_uni_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_uni_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_spe_uni_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_uni_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					spe_uni_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_uni_c_var_2
				add = spe_uni_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_uni_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_uni_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_uni_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_uni_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_uni_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_uni_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_spe_uni_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_spe_uni = yes #?


		#stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1 bank owner & circulating_spe_uni_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_uni_currency
			}

			#circulating_spe_uni_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_spe_uni_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					spe_uni_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_uni_c_var_2
					add = spe_uni_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_uni_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_uni_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_spe_uni_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_spe_uni_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_spe_uni_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_uni_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_spe_uni & stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_uni_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_spe_uni_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_uni_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_spe_uni
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_spe_uni > 0
						export_to_spe_uni > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_spe_uni_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_spe_uni_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_uni_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_spe_uni
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_uni_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_uni_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_uni_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_spe_uni
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_spe_uni
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_spe_uni > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_spe_uni
				add = import_in_spe_uni
			}
		}
		#all_spe_uni_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_spe_uni_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_spe_uni_state  #var:stockpiling_spe_uni_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#spe_yen
	stockpiling_spe_yen_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le spe_yen_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_spe_yen_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_spe_yen_c_var_1 & stockpiling_spe_yen_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_spe_yen_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_yen_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_spe_yen_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_yen_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_spe_yen_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_yen_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					spe_yen_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_yen_c_var_2
				add = spe_yen_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_yen_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_yen_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_yen_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_yen_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_yen_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_yen_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_spe_yen_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_spe_yen = yes #?


		#stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1 bank owner & circulating_spe_yen_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_yen_currency
			}

			#circulating_spe_yen_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_spe_yen_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					spe_yen_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_yen_c_var_2
					add = spe_yen_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_yen_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_yen_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_spe_yen_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_spe_yen_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_spe_yen_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_yen_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_spe_yen & stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_yen_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_spe_yen_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_yen_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_spe_yen
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_spe_yen > 0
						export_to_spe_yen > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_spe_yen_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_spe_yen_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_yen_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_spe_yen
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_yen_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_yen_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_yen_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_spe_yen
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_spe_yen
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_spe_yen > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_spe_yen
				add = import_in_spe_yen
			}
		}
		#all_spe_yen_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_spe_yen_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_spe_yen_state  #var:stockpiling_spe_yen_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#spe_yuan
	stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le spe_yuan_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_var_1 & stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_spe_yuan_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_spe_yuan_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					spe_yuan_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_var_2
				add = spe_yuan_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_yuan_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_yuan_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_spe_yuan = yes #?


		#stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1 bank owner & circulating_spe_yuan_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_yuan_currency
			}

			#circulating_spe_yuan_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_spe_yuan_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					spe_yuan_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_yuan_c_var_2
					add = spe_yuan_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_yuan_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_yuan_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_spe_yuan_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_spe_yuan & stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_yuan_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_spe_yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_spe_yuan > 0
						export_to_spe_yuan > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_spe_yuan
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_yuan_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_spe_yuan
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_spe_yuan
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_spe_yuan > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_spe_yuan
				add = import_in_spe_yuan
			}
		}
		#all_spe_yuan_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_spe_yuan_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_spe_yuan_state  #var:stockpiling_spe_yuan_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#spe_zloti
	stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le spe_zloti_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_var_1 & stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_spe_zloti_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					spe_zloti_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_var_2
				add = spe_zloti_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_zloti_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_zloti_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_spe_zloti = yes #?


		#stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1 bank owner & circulating_spe_zloti_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_zloti_currency
			}

			#circulating_spe_zloti_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_spe_zloti_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					spe_zloti_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_zloti_c_var_2
					add = spe_zloti_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_zloti_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_spe_zloti_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_spe_zloti_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_spe_zloti & stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_spe_zloti_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_spe_zloti
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_spe_zloti > 0
						export_to_spe_zloti > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_spe_zloti
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_spe_zloti_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_spe_zloti
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_spe_zloti
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_spe_zloti > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_spe_zloti
				add = import_in_spe_zloti
			}
		}
		#all_spe_zloti_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_spe_zloti_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_spe_zloti_state  #var:stockpiling_spe_zloti_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
	stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_1 & stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_2
				add = thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler = yes #?


		#stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1 bank owner & circulating_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency
			}

			#circulating_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_2
					add = thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler & stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler > 0
						export_to_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
				add = import_in_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
			}
		}
		#all_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state  #var:stockpiling_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#thaler_prussian_thaler
	stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le thaler_prussian_thaler_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_1 & stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					thaler_prussian_thaler_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_2
				add = thaler_prussian_thaler_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_thaler_prussian_thaler = yes #?


		#stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1 bank owner & circulating_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency
			}

			#circulating_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					thaler_prussian_thaler_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_2
					add = thaler_prussian_thaler_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_thaler_prussian_thaler & stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_thaler_prussian_thaler
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_thaler_prussian_thaler > 0
						export_to_thaler_prussian_thaler > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_thaler_prussian_thaler
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_thaler_prussian_thaler
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_thaler_prussian_thaler
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_thaler_prussian_thaler > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_thaler_prussian_thaler
				add = import_in_thaler_prussian_thaler
			}
		}
		#all_thaler_prussian_thaler_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_thaler_prussian_thaler_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state  #var:stockpiling_thaler_prussian_thaler_state_1
			}
		}
	}
	#thaler_saxon_thaler
	stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_1 = {
		#il ne faut pas que des sujet no market owner puisse déclanché car le thaler_saxon_thaler_c_market_goods_delta et donc le stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_2 sont positif quelque soit le market owner si il y a le  bien dans le marché

		#######################################################################
		#scope
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				save_scope_as = central_bank_site
			}
		}
		#######################################################################

		#recap:
		#stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_1 & stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
		#ce  sont lees vrai  valeur de stockage qui  sont  modifier  tout  lees  moi  puis bloquer  dans  une variable  de  l'etaat  de la bank  centrale
		#mais si  il  y  a  des  modifiactionn  sur  la variable  enttre  2  fixe doit récuppérer stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state qui est définit par la varriable dde l'etat et qui peut  etre  modifier par  les  echange  de  devise

		#######################################################################
		#preparation de variable

		#cela est pour récupérer la valeur de l'etat
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_1
			value = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_1
			subtract = var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency #si un nouveau pays ce crer alors cette valeur sera de 2 est la totalité des reserve de l'etat sera equivalenbte à l'ancienne valeur dans l'etat et la valeur issiu de la reserve
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_2
			value = 0
		}
		#######################################################################

		if = {
			limit = {
				or = {
					thaler_saxon_thaler_c_market_goods_delta > 0
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					var:revaluation_on = 1
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_2
				add = thaler_saxon_thaler_c_market_goods_delta
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_2
				multiply = 4 #month
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire devaluation
				limit = {
					var:devaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_add_per_month
				}
			}
			if = { #politique monétaire réévaluation
				limit = {
					var:revaluation_on = 1
					has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency #?
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_2
					add = money_supply_to_subtract_per_month
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_1
				add = var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_2
			}
		}


		#reset_import_export_thaler_saxon_thaler = yes #?


		#stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1 bank owner & circulating_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_2
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
			}

			#circulating_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_1 #les pop
			set_variable = {
				name = circulating_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_2
				value = 0
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					thaler_saxon_thaler_c_market_goods_buy_orders > 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_2
					add = thaler_saxon_thaler_c_market_goods_buy_orders
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_2
					multiply = 4
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = circulating_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_1
					add = var:circulating_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_2
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_state_1
			if = {
				limit = {
					market_owner_is_root = yes
					stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_2 > 0
					#is_in_revaluation = no
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		#reserve_currency_thaler_saxon_thaler & stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
		if = {
			limit = {
				market_owner_is_root = yes
				not = {
					has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
				}
			}

			#stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1 subject
			if = {
				limit = {
					stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_2 > 0
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			#reserve_currency_thaler_saxon_thaler
			if = {
				limit = {
					or  = {
						#export_in_thaler_saxon_thaler > 0
						export_to_thaler_saxon_thaler > 0 #revient au meme et beaucoup moinn de chiffre à géré et à calculé
						not  = {
							scope:central_bank_site.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1 = owner.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}
				#quantité de devise stocké par la balanace du commerce
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
					add = export_in_thaler_saxon_thaler
				}
				scope:central_bank_site = {
					if = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
							value = root.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
						}
					}
				}

				#ajout au gui du flux de l'accumulation
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_var_2
					add  = {
						add = export_in_thaler_saxon_thaler
						divide = 4
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#debt_in_thaler_saxon_thaler
		if = {
			limit = {
				import_in_thaler_saxon_thaler > 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_thaler_saxon_thaler
				add = import_in_thaler_saxon_thaler
			}
		}
		#all_thaler_saxon_thaler_stored #?
		scope:central_bank_site = {
			set_variable = {
				name = all_thaler_saxon_thaler_stored
				value = owner.stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state  #var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
			}
		}
	}
#end_tag_1

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

#brace
	#dinar
	buy_dinar_currency = {

		#scope:
		root = {
			save_scope_as = buyer
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}
		random_in_global_list = {
			variable = dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
			save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
				}
			}
		}

		#reset_purchase_cycle
		set_variable = {
			name = purchase_cycle
			value = 0
		}
		#mecha
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
				scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
					buy_currency_1 = yes
				}
			}

			scope:buyer = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						not  = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = dinar_quantity_var
						value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						value = var:dinar_quantity_var
					}

					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal
						value = {
							value = 1
							add = var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
							multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
						}
					}

					#gold
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_dinar_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
							var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal < gold_state_native_for_stockpile
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_dinar_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
							#metal
							change_variable = {
								name = gold_state_1
								add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal

							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
								subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site = {
							scope:central_bank_site = {
								#metal
								change_variable = {
									name = gold_state_1
									subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal

								}
								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
									add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
								}
							}
						}
						#notification
						every_country = {
							limit  = {
								is_player = yes
							}
							save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
							}
							scope:is_player_for_notification = {
								post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = purchase_cycle
							value = 1
						}
					}

					#silver
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_dinar_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
							var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal < silver_state_native_for_stockpile
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_dinar_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
							#metal
							change_variable = {
								name = silver_state_1
								add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
								subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site = {
							scope:central_bank_site = {
								#metal
								change_variable = {
									name = silver_state_1
									subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal
								}
								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
									add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
								}
							}
						}
						#notification
						every_country = {
							limit  = {
								is_player = yes
							}
							save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
							}
							scope:is_player_for_notification = {
								post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = purchase_cycle
							value = 1
						}
					}

				}
			}
		}
	}
	sell_dinar_currency = {

		#scope:
		root = {
			save_scope_as = seller_root
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_root
				}
			}
		}
		random_in_global_list = {
			variable = dinar_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
			save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner
				}
			}
		}

		#mecha
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
					sell_currency_1 = yes
				}
			}

			scope:seller_root = {
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_quantity_var
					value = stockpiling_dinar_state
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					value = var:dinar_quantity_var
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					multiply = 0.5
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				#gold
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_dinar_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
								scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal < gold_state_native_for_stockpile
							}
							sell_currency_2 = yes
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = gold_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
						}
					}
				}

				#silver
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_dinar_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
								scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal < silver_state_native_for_stockpile
							}
							sell_currency_2 = yes
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = silver_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
						}
					}
				}
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					#gold
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_dinar_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = gold_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					#silver
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_dinar_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = silver_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	sell_dinar_currency_crisis = {

		#scope:
		scope:seller = {
			save_scope_as = seller_root
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_root
				}
			}
		}
		scope:target_country = {
			save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner
				}
			}
		}

		#mecha
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
					sell_currency_crisis_1 = yes
				}
			}

			scope:seller_root = {
				set_variable = {
					name = dinar_quantity_var
					value = stockpiling_dinar_state
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					value = var:dinar_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				#gold
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_dinar_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = gold_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}

					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_dinar_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_dinar_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = unstable_currency_message
						}
					}
				}

				#silver
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_dinar_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
					}
