							var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal < silver_state_native_for_stockpile
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
							#metal
							change_variable = {
								name = silver_state_1
								add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
								subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site = {
							scope:central_bank_site = {
								#metal
								change_variable = {
									name = silver_state_1
									subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal
								}
								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
									add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
								}
							}
						}
						#notification
						every_country = {
							limit  = {
								is_player = yes
							}
							save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
							}
							scope:is_player_for_notification = {
								post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = purchase_cycle
							value = 1
						}
					}

				}
			}
		}
	}
	sell_eco_west_african_eco_currency = {

		#scope:
		root = {
			save_scope_as = seller_root
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_root
				}
			}
		}
		random_in_global_list = {
			variable = eco_west_african_eco_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
			save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner
				}
			}
		}

		#mecha
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
					sell_currency_1 = yes
				}
			}

			scope:seller_root = {
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_west_african_eco_quantity_var
					value = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					value = var:eco_west_african_eco_quantity_var
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					multiply = 0.5
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				#gold
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_eco_west_african_eco_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
								scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal < gold_state_native_for_stockpile
							}
							sell_currency_2 = yes
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = gold_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
						}
					}
				}

				#silver
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_eco_west_african_eco_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
								scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal < silver_state_native_for_stockpile
							}
							sell_currency_2 = yes
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = silver_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
						}
					}
				}
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					#gold
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_eco_west_african_eco_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = gold_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					#silver
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_eco_west_african_eco_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = silver_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	sell_eco_west_african_eco_currency_crisis = {

		#scope:
		scope:seller = {
			save_scope_as = seller_root
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_root
				}
			}
		}
		scope:target_country = {
			save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner
				}
			}
		}

		#mecha
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_eco_west_african_eco_currency
					sell_currency_crisis_1 = yes
				}
			}

			scope:seller_root = {
				set_variable = {
					name = eco_west_african_eco_quantity_var
					value = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					value = var:eco_west_african_eco_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				#gold
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_eco_west_african_eco_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = gold_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}

					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = unstable_currency_message
						}
					}
				}

				#silver
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_eco_west_african_eco_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = silver_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency > 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}

					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = unstable_currency_message
						}
					}
				}
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					#gold
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_eco_west_african_eco_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = gold_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					#silver
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_eco_west_african_eco_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = silver_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_eco_west_african_eco_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	#franc_belgian_franc
	buy_franc_belgian_franc_currency = {

		#scope:
		root = {
			save_scope_as = buyer
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}
		random_in_global_list = {
			variable = franc_belgian_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
			save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
				}
			}
		}

		#reset_purchase_cycle
		set_variable = {
			name = purchase_cycle
			value = 0
		}
		#mecha
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
				scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
					buy_currency_1 = yes
				}
			}

			scope:buyer = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						not  = {
							has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
						value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						value = var:franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
					}

					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal
						value = {
							value = 1
							add = var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
							multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
						}
					}

					#gold
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_franc_belgian_franc_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
							var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal < gold_state_native_for_stockpile
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
							#metal
							change_variable = {
								name = gold_state_1
								add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal

							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
								subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site = {
							scope:central_bank_site = {
								#metal
								change_variable = {
									name = gold_state_1
									subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal

								}
								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
									add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
								}
							}
						}
						#notification
						every_country = {
							limit  = {
								is_player = yes
							}
							save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
							}
							scope:is_player_for_notification = {
								post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = purchase_cycle
							value = 1
						}
					}

					#silver
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_franc_belgian_franc_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
							var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal < silver_state_native_for_stockpile
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
							#metal
							change_variable = {
								name = silver_state_1
								add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
								subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site = {
							scope:central_bank_site = {
								#metal
								change_variable = {
									name = silver_state_1
									subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal
								}
								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
									add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
								}
							}
						}
						#notification
						every_country = {
							limit  = {
								is_player = yes
							}
							save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
							}
							scope:is_player_for_notification = {
								post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = purchase_cycle
							value = 1
						}
					}

				}
			}
		}
	}
	sell_franc_belgian_franc_currency = {

		#scope:
		root = {
			save_scope_as = seller_root
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_root
				}
			}
		}
		random_in_global_list = {
			variable = franc_belgian_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
			save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner
				}
			}
		}

		#mecha
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
					sell_currency_1 = yes
				}
			}

			scope:seller_root = {
				set_variable = {
					name = franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
					value = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					value = var:franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					multiply = 0.5
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				#gold
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_franc_belgian_franc_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
								scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal < gold_state_native_for_stockpile
							}
							sell_currency_2 = yes
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = gold_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
						}
					}
				}

				#silver
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_franc_belgian_franc_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
								scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal < silver_state_native_for_stockpile
							}
							sell_currency_2 = yes
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = silver_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
						}
					}
				}
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					#gold
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_franc_belgian_franc_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = gold_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					#silver
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_franc_belgian_franc_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = silver_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	sell_franc_belgian_franc_currency_crisis = {

		#scope:
		scope:seller = {
			save_scope_as = seller_root
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_root
				}
			}
		}
		scope:target_country = {
			save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner
				}
			}
		}

		#mecha
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_belgian_franc_currency
					sell_currency_crisis_1 = yes
				}
			}

			scope:seller_root = {
				set_variable = {
					name = franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
					value = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					value = var:franc_belgian_franc_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				#gold
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_franc_belgian_franc_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = gold_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}

					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = unstable_currency_message
						}
					}
				}

				#silver
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_franc_belgian_franc_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = silver_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency > 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}

					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = unstable_currency_message
						}
					}
				}
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					#gold
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_franc_belgian_franc_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = gold_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					#silver
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_franc_belgian_franc_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = silver_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_belgian_franc_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	#franc_french_franc
	buy_franc_french_franc_currency = {

		#scope:
		root = {
			save_scope_as = buyer
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}
		random_in_global_list = {
			variable = franc_french_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
			save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
				}
			}
		}

		#reset_purchase_cycle
		set_variable = {
			name = purchase_cycle
			value = 0
		}
		#mecha
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
				scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency
					buy_currency_1 = yes
				}
			}

			scope:buyer = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						not  = {
							has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = franc_french_franc_quantity_var
						value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						value = var:franc_french_franc_quantity_var
					}

					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal
						value = {
							value = 1
							add = var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
							multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
						}
					}

					#gold
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_franc_french_franc_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
							var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal < gold_state_native_for_stockpile
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
							#metal
							change_variable = {
								name = gold_state_1
								add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal

							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
								subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site = {
							scope:central_bank_site = {
								#metal
								change_variable = {
									name = gold_state_1
									subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal

								}
								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
									add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
								}
							}
						}
						#notification
						every_country = {
							limit  = {
								is_player = yes
							}
							save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
							}
							scope:is_player_for_notification = {
								post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = purchase_cycle
							value = 1
						}
					}

					#silver
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_franc_french_franc_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
							var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal < silver_state_native_for_stockpile
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
							#metal
							change_variable = {
								name = silver_state_1
								add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
								subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site = {
							scope:central_bank_site = {
								#metal
								change_variable = {
									name = silver_state_1
									subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal
								}
								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
									add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
								}
							}
						}
						#notification
						every_country = {
							limit  = {
								is_player = yes
							}
							save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
							}
							scope:is_player_for_notification = {
								post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = purchase_cycle
							value = 1
						}
					}

				}
			}
		}
	}
	sell_franc_french_franc_currency = {

		#scope:
		root = {
			save_scope_as = seller_root
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_root
				}
			}
		}
		random_in_global_list = {
			variable = franc_french_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
			save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner
				}
			}
		}

		#mecha
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency
					sell_currency_1 = yes
				}
			}

			scope:seller_root = {
				set_variable = {
					name = franc_french_franc_quantity_var
					value = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					value = var:franc_french_franc_quantity_var
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					multiply = 0.5
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				#gold
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_franc_french_franc_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
								scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal < gold_state_native_for_stockpile
							}
							sell_currency_2 = yes
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = gold_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
						}
					}
				}

				#silver
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_franc_french_franc_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
								scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal < silver_state_native_for_stockpile
							}
							sell_currency_2 = yes
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = silver_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
						}
					}
				}
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					#gold
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_franc_french_franc_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = gold_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					#silver
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_franc_french_franc_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = silver_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	sell_franc_french_franc_currency_crisis = {

		#scope:
		scope:seller = {
			save_scope_as = seller_root
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_root
				}
			}
		}
		scope:target_country = {
			save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner
				}
			}
		}

		#mecha
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_french_franc_currency
					sell_currency_crisis_1 = yes
				}
			}

			scope:seller_root = {
				set_variable = {
					name = franc_french_franc_quantity_var
					value = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					value = var:franc_french_franc_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				#gold
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_franc_french_franc_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = gold_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}

					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = unstable_currency_message
						}
					}
				}

				#silver
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_franc_french_franc_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = silver_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency > 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}

					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_franc_french_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = unstable_currency_message
						}
					}
				}
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					#gold
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_franc_french_franc_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = gold_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					#silver
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_franc_french_franc_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = silver_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_french_franc_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	#franc_luxembourgish_franc
	buy_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency = {

		#scope:
		root = {
			save_scope_as = buyer
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}
		random_in_global_list = {
			variable = franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
			save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
				}
			}
		}

		#reset_purchase_cycle
		set_variable = {
			name = purchase_cycle
			value = 0
		}
		#mecha
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
				scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
					buy_currency_1 = yes
				}
			}

			scope:buyer = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						not  = {
							has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
						value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						value = var:franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
					}

					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal
						value = {
							value = 1
							add = var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
							multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
						}
					}

					#gold
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
							var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal < gold_state_native_for_stockpile
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
							#metal
							change_variable = {
								name = gold_state_1
								add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal

							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
								subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site = {
							scope:central_bank_site = {
								#metal
								change_variable = {
									name = gold_state_1
									subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal

								}
								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
									add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
								}
							}
						}
						#notification
						every_country = {
							limit  = {
								is_player = yes
							}
							save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
							}
							scope:is_player_for_notification = {
								post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = purchase_cycle
							value = 1
						}
					}

					#silver
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
							var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal < silver_state_native_for_stockpile
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
							#metal
							change_variable = {
								name = silver_state_1
								add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
								subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site = {
							scope:central_bank_site = {
								#metal
								change_variable = {
									name = silver_state_1
									subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal
								}
								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
									add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
								}
							}
						}
						#notification
						every_country = {
							limit  = {
								is_player = yes
							}
							save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
							}
							scope:is_player_for_notification = {
								post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = purchase_cycle
							value = 1
						}
					}

				}
			}
		}
	}
	sell_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency = {

		#scope:
		root = {
			save_scope_as = seller_root
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_root
				}
			}
		}
		random_in_global_list = {
			variable = franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
			save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner
				}
			}
		}

		#mecha
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
					sell_currency_1 = yes
				}
			}

			scope:seller_root = {
				set_variable = {
					name = franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
					value = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					value = var:franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					multiply = 0.5
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				#gold
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
								scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal < gold_state_native_for_stockpile
							}
							sell_currency_2 = yes
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = gold_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
						}
					}
				}

				#silver
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
								scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal < silver_state_native_for_stockpile
							}
							sell_currency_2 = yes
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = silver_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
						}
					}
				}
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					#gold
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = gold_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					#silver
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = silver_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	sell_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency_crisis = {

		#scope:
		scope:seller = {
			save_scope_as = seller_root
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_root
				}
			}
		}
		scope:target_country = {
			save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner
				}
			}
		}

		#mecha
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_currency
					sell_currency_crisis_1 = yes
				}
			}

			scope:seller_root = {
				set_variable = {
					name = franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
					value = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					value = var:franc_luxembourgish_franc_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				#gold
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = gold_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}

					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = unstable_currency_message
						}
					}
				}

				#silver
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = silver_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency > 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}

					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = unstable_currency_message
						}
					}
				}
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					#gold
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = gold_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					#silver
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_franc_luxembourgish_franc_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = silver_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_luxembourgish_franc_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	#franc_swiss_franc
	buy_franc_swiss_franc_currency = {

		#scope:
		root = {
			save_scope_as = buyer
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site
				}
			}
		}
		random_in_global_list = {
			variable = franc_swiss_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
			save_scope_as = undervalued_currency_country_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_seller
				}
			}
		}

		#reset_purchase_cycle
		set_variable = {
			name = purchase_cycle
			value = 0
		}
		#mecha
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner
				scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
					buy_currency_1 = yes
				}
			}

			scope:buyer = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						not  = {
							has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = franc_swiss_franc_quantity_var
						value = { 1000000 10000000 }
					}
					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						value = var:franc_swiss_franc_quantity_var
					}

					set_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal
						value = {
							value = 1
							add = var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
							multiply = scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.money_value
						}
					}

					#gold
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_franc_swiss_franc_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
							var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal < gold_state_native_for_stockpile
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
							#metal
							change_variable = {
								name = gold_state_1
								add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal

							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
								subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site = {
							scope:central_bank_site = {
								#metal
								change_variable = {
									name = gold_state_1
									subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal

								}
								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
									add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
								}
							}
						}
						#notification
						every_country = {
							limit  = {
								is_player = yes
							}
							save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
							}
							scope:is_player_for_notification = {
								post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = purchase_cycle
							value = 1
						}
					}

					#silver
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_franc_swiss_franc_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
							var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal < silver_state_native_for_stockpile
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
							#metal
							change_variable = {
								name = silver_state_1
								add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
								subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site = {
							scope:central_bank_site = {
								#metal
								change_variable = {
									name = silver_state_1
									subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal
								}
								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
									add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
								}
							}
						}
						#notification
						every_country = {
							limit  = {
								is_player = yes
							}
							save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
							}
							scope:is_player_for_notification = {
								post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = purchase_cycle
							value = 1
						}
					}

				}
			}
		}
	}
	sell_franc_swiss_franc_currency = {

		#scope:
		root = {
			save_scope_as = seller_root
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_root
				}
			}
		}
		random_in_global_list = {
			variable = franc_swiss_franc_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
			save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner
				}
			}
		}

		#mecha
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_franc_swiss_franc_currency
					sell_currency_1 = yes
				}
			}

			scope:seller_root = {
				set_variable = {
					name = franc_swiss_franc_quantity_var
					value = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					value = var:franc_swiss_franc_quantity_var
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					multiply = 0.5
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				#gold
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_franc_swiss_franc_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
								scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal < gold_state_native_for_stockpile
							}
							sell_currency_2 = yes
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = gold_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
						}
					}
				}

				#silver
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_franc_swiss_franc_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
								scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal < silver_state_native_for_stockpile
							}
							sell_currency_2 = yes
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = silver_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_franc_swiss_franc_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
