							scope:central_bank_site = {
								#metal
								change_variable = {
									name = gold_state_1
									subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal

								}
								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
									add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
								}
							}
						}
						#notification
						every_country = {
							limit  = {
								is_player = yes
							}
							save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
							}
							scope:is_player_for_notification = {
								post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = purchase_cycle
							value = 1
						}
					}

					#silver
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_thaler_saxon_thaler_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
							var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal < silver_state_native_for_stockpile
							scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner.stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state > var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_seller = {
							#metal
							change_variable = {
								name = silver_state_1
								add = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
								subtract = scope:buyer.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site = {
							scope:central_bank_site = {
								#metal
								change_variable = {
									name = silver_state_1
									subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_currency_state_1_buyer_in_metal
								}
								change_variable = {
									name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
									add = owner.var:stockpiling_undervalued_quantity_var
								}
							}
						}
						#notification
						every_country = {
							limit  = {
								is_player = yes
							}
							save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								scope:undervalued_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
							}
							scope:is_player_for_notification = {
								post_notification = your_currency_are_buy_message
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = purchase_cycle
							value = 1
						}
					}

				}
			}
		}
	}
	sell_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency = {

		#scope:
		root = {
			save_scope_as = seller_root
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_root
				}
			}
		}
		random_in_global_list = {
			variable = thaler_saxon_thaler_currency_law_list_ordered_1 #overrated_currency_list
			save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner
				}
			}
		}

		#mecha
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
					sell_currency_1 = yes
				}
			}

			scope:seller_root = {
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity_var
					value = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					value = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity_var
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					multiply = 0.5
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				#gold
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_thaler_saxon_thaler_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
								scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal < gold_state_native_for_stockpile
							}
							sell_currency_2 = yes
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = gold_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
						}
					}
				}

				#silver
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_thaler_saxon_thaler_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
						OR = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = { #verifit si la reserve d'or du pays avec la devise sur évalué est superieur à ce qu'elle doit
								scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal < silver_state_native_for_stockpile
							}
							sell_currency_2 = yes
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = silver_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					#currency
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
						subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
								add = PREV.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							owner.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency = 0
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
								subtract = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = your_currency_are_sell_message
						}
					}
				}
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					#gold
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_thaler_saxon_thaler_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = gold_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					#silver
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_thaler_saxon_thaler_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = silver_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}
	sell_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency_crisis = {

		#scope:
		scope:seller = {
			save_scope_as = seller_root
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_root
				}
			}
		}
		scope:target_country = {
			save_scope_as = overrated_currency_country_owner
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					save_scope_as = central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner
				}
			}
		}

		#mecha
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
					sell_currency_crisis_1 = yes
				}
			}

			scope:seller_root = {
				set_variable = {
					name = thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity_var
					value = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
					value = var:thaler_saxon_thaler_quantity_var
				}

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
					value = {
						value = 1
						add = var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
						multiply = scope:overrated_currency_country_owner.money_value
					}
				}

				#gold
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_thaler_saxon_thaler_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = gold_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency < 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}

					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = unstable_currency_message
						}
					}
				}

				#silver
				if = {
					limit = {
						law_thaler_saxon_thaler_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						#metal
						change_variable = {
							name = silver_state_1
							add = owner.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
						}
					}

					if = {
						limit = {
							var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency > 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							value = 0
						}
					}
					scope:central_bank_site_root = {
						set_variable = {
							name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
							value = 0
						}
					}

					if = { #actualise la variable
						limit = {
							not  = {
								scope:central_bank_site_root.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1 = var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_root = {
							set_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
								value = PREV.var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_c_in_reserve_currency
							}
						}
					}
					#notification
					every_country = {
						limit  = {
							is_player = yes
						}
						save_scope_as = is_player_for_notification
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = scope:is_player_for_notification
						}
						scope:is_player_for_notification = {
							post_notification = unstable_currency_message
						}
					}
				}
				scope:overrated_currency_country_owner = {
					#gold
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_thaler_saxon_thaler_monetary_system_GS_GES_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = gold_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					#silver
					if = {
						limit = {
							law_thaler_saxon_thaler_monetary_system_SS_BS_trigger = yes
						}
						scope:central_bank_site_overrated_currency_owner = {
							change_variable = {
								name = silver_state_1
								subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_currency_state_1_buy_in_metal
							}
							change_variable = {
								name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
								add = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
							}
						}
					}
					reset_debt_in_national_currency = yes
				}
			}
		}
	}

#brace

# ██████╗ ███████╗███████╗███████╗████████╗     ██████╗ ███████╗██████╗ ████████╗
# ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝     ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝
# ██████╔╝█████╗  ███████╗█████╗     ██║        ██║  ██║█████╗  ██████╔╝   ██║
# ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ╚════██║██╔══╝     ██║        ██║  ██║██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗   ██║
# ██║  ██║███████╗███████║███████╗   ██║███████╗██████╔╝███████╗██████╔╝   ██║
# ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝   ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═════╝ ╚══════╝╚═════╝    ╚═╝
#
# ██╗███╗   ██╗        ███╗   ██╗ █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗              ██████╗██╗   ██╗██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗██╗   ██╗
# ██║████╗  ██║        ████╗  ██║██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║██╔══██╗██║             ██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝
# ██║██╔██╗ ██║        ██╔██╗ ██║███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║███████║██║             ██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║      ╚████╔╝
# ██║██║╚██╗██║        ██║╚██╗██║██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══██║██║             ██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██║       ╚██╔╝
# ██║██║ ╚████║███████╗██║ ╚████║██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║██║  ██║███████╗███████╗╚██████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗   ██║
# ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝
#
# ██████╗ ██╗      █████╗ ██╗   ██╗███████╗██████╗
# ██╔══██╗██║     ██╔══██╗╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔════╝██╔══██╗
# ██████╔╝██║     ███████║ ╚████╔╝ █████╗  ██████╔╝
# ██╔═══╝ ██║     ██╔══██║  ╚██╔╝  ██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗
# ██║     ███████╗██║  ██║   ██║   ███████╗██║  ██║
# ╚═╝     ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

reset_debt_in_national_currency_player = {
	#dinar
	if  = {
		limit  = {
			scope:player_country = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
			}
			var:debt_in_national_currency_dinar > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar
			subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:debt_in_national_currency_dinar < 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	#dinar_algerian_dinar
	if  = {
		limit  = {
			scope:player_country = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
			}
			var:debt_in_national_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar
			subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:debt_in_national_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar < 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	#dinar_iraqi_dinar
	if  = {
		limit  = {
			scope:player_country = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
			}
			var:debt_in_national_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar
			subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:debt_in_national_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar < 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	#dinar_libyan_dinar
	if  = {
		limit  = {
			scope:player_country = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
			}

			}
			var:debt_in_national_currency_franc_belgian_franc > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_franc_belgian_franc
			subtract = scope:player_country.var:currency_quantity
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:debt_in_national_currency_franc_belgian_franc < 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_franc_belgian_franc
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}

				var:debt_in_national_currency_peso_cuban_peso < 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_cuban_peso
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}

stockpiling_capital_state_transfert = {
	financial_center_modifier = yes

	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site_capital
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = no
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site_no_capital
		}
	}

	if  = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:central_bank_site_no_capital
		}

		#actual Capital
		scope:central_bank_site_capital = {

			#####################
			#metal
			#####################

			change_variable = {
				name = gold_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:gold_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = silver_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:silver_state_1
					}
				}
			}

			#####################
			#Goods
			#####################

			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_grain_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_grain_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_wood_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_wood_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_coal_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_coal_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_iron_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_iron_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_sulfur_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_sulfur_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lead_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_lead_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_oil_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_oil_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dye_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_dye_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_silk_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_silk_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_rubber_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_rubber_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ammunition_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_ammunition_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_small_arms_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_small_arms_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_artillery_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_artillery_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_tanks_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_tanks_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_aeroplanes_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_aeroplanes_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_manowars_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_manowars_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_ironclads_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_ironclads_state_1
					}
				}
			}


			#####################
			#currrency
			#####################

            change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:all_dinar_stored #l'ancienne synthèse devien la nouvellee reserve
					}
				}
			}
            change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_dinar_algerian_dinar_state_1
				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {

					}
				}
			}
            change_variable = {

				add = {
					scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {

					}
				}
			}
            change_variable = {

		scope:central_bank_site_no_capital = {
			if  = {
				limit  = {
					exists = scope:central_bank_site_no_capital
				}

					name = stockpiling_pound_irish_pound_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				#pound_sterling

				#thaler_saxon_thaler
				set_variable = {
					name = all_thaler_saxon_thaler_stored
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_reserve_currency_state_1
					value = 0
				}

				#####################
				#modifier
				#####################

				remove_modifier = central_bank_place
				remove_modifier = central_bank_historic_place

				remove_modifier = national_stockpile_place
				remove_modifier = national_stockpile_historic_place

				add_modifier = {
					name = looted_state
					months = 3
				}
			}
		}
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			any_scope_state = {
				var:financial_center_site_var = 0
				or = {
					var:stockpiling_bond_var_state_1 > 0
					var:stockpiling_manufacture_stock_var_state_1 > 0
					var:stockpiling_agricultural_stock_var_state_1 > 0
					var:stockpiling_mining_stock_var_state_1 > 0
					var:stockpiling_railroad_stock_var_state_1 > 0
				}
			}
		}
		stockpiling_capital_state_transfert_financial_center_place = yes
	}
}
stockpiling_capital_state_transfert_financial_center_place = {
	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:financial_center_site_var =  1
			}
			save_scope_as = financial_center_site_capital #non nécessairement la capital
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:financial_center_site_var = 0
				not = {
					var:looted_state = 1
				}
			}
			save_scope_as = financial_center_site_no_capital #non nécessairement la capital
		}
	}
	if  = {
		limit  = {
			exists = scope:financial_center_site_no_capital
			#exists = scope:financial_center_site_capital
		}

		#actual Capital
		scope:financial_center_site_capital = {

			change_variable = {
				name = test_var_1
				add = 1
			}

			#####################
			#financial product
			#####################

			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_bond_var_state_1
				add = {
					scope:financial_center_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_bond_var_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_manufacture_stock_var_state_1
				add = {
					scope:financial_center_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_manufacture_stock_var_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_agricultural_stock_var_state_1
				add = {
					scope:financial_center_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_agricultural_stock_var_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_mining_stock_var_state_1
				add = {
					scope:financial_center_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_mining_stock_var_state_1
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_railroad_stock_var_state_1
				add = {
					scope:financial_center_site_no_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_railroad_stock_var_state_1
					}
				}
			}
		}

		#old capital
		scope:financial_center_site_no_capital = {
			if  = {
				limit  = {
					exists = scope:financial_center_site_no_capital
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = looted_state
					value = 1
				}

				change_variable = {
					name = test_var_1
					add = 1
				}

				#####################
				#financial product
				#####################

				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_bond_var_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_manufacture_stock_var_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_agricultural_stock_var_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mining_stock_var_state_1
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_railroad_stock_var_state_1
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
enemy_capital_is_occuped = {
	set_variable  = {
		name = looting_1_year
		value = 1
	}

	every_scope_state = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = central_bank_historic_place
				is_capital = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = central_bank_site_capital
		}
	}
	every_country = {
		limit = {
			is_at_war = yes
			has_war_with = ROOT
		}
		capital = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					controller = ROOT
					has_modifier = central_bank_place

				}
				save_scope_as = occupied_capital
			}
		}
	}

	if  = {
		limit = {
			exists = scope:occupied_capital
		}

		scope:central_bank_site_capital = {

			owner  = {
				change_infamy = 50
			}

			#####################
			#gold
			#####################

			change_variable = {
				name = gold_state_1
				add = {
					scope:occupied_capital = {
						add = var:gold_state_1
						multiply = 0.5
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = silver_state_1
				add = {
					scope:occupied_capital = {
						add = var:silver_state_1
						multiply = 0.5
					}
				}
			}

			#####################
			#Goods
			#####################

			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_grain_state_1
				add = {
					scope:occupied_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_grain_state_1
						multiply = 0.5
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_wood_state_1
				add = {
					scope:occupied_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_wood_state_1
						multiply = 0.5
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_coal_state_1
				add = {
					scope:occupied_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_coal_state_1
						multiply = 0.5
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_iron_state_1
				add = {
					scope:occupied_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_iron_state_1
						multiply = 0.5
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_sulfur_state_1
				add = {
					scope:occupied_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_sulfur_state_1
						multiply = 0.5
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_lead_state_1

					scope:occupied_capital = {
						add = var:stockpiling_lead_state_1
						multiply = 0.5
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = stockpiling_oil_state_1
				add = {
					scope:occupied_capital = {

			change_variable = {

						add = var:stockpiling_thaler_saxon_thaler_state_1
                        multiply = 0.5
					}
				}
			}
		}
		scope:occupied_capital = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					exists = scope:occupied_capital
				}

				#####################
				#gold
				#####################

				change_variable = {
					name = gold_state_1
					divide = 2
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = silver_state_1
					divide = 2
				}

				#####################
				#Goods
				#####################

				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_grain_state_1
					divide = 2
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_wood_state_1
					divide = 2
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_coal_state_1
					divide = 2
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_iron_state_1
					divide = 2
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sulfur_state_1
					divide = 2
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lead_state_1
					divide = 2
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_oil_state_1
					divide = 2
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dye_state_1
					divide = 2
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_silk_state_1
					divide = 2
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rubber_state_1
					divide = 2
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_ammunition_state_1
					divide = 2
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_small_arms_state_1

	#deesactive la bank ceentrrale jusqu'à la fin de la guerre
	scope:occupied_capital = {
		random_scope_building = {
			limit = {
				is_building_group = bg_bank
			}
			remove_modifier = modifier_desactive_bank
			add_modifier = {
				name = modifier_desactive_bank
				months = 12
			}
		}
	}

enemy_stats_is_occuped = {
	every_country = {
		limit = {
			is_at_war = yes
			has_war_with = ROOT
		}
		every_scope_state = {
		#every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					controller = ROOT
				}
				remove_modifier = modifier_desactive_building
				add_modifier = {
					name = modifier_desactive_building
					months = 6
				}
				#save_scope_as = occupied_state
			}
		}
	}

	# #test
	# change_variable  = {
	# 	name = test_occuped
	# 	add = 1
	# }
}

# ██╗███╗   ██╗██╗   ██╗███████╗███████╗████████╗███████╗███╗   ███╗███████╗███╗   ██╗████████╗
# ██║████╗  ██║██║   ██║██╔════╝██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝██╔════╝████╗ ████║██╔════╝████╗  ██║╚══██╔══╝
# ██║██╔██╗ ██║██║   ██║█████╗  ███████╗   ██║   █████╗  ██╔████╔██║█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║   ██║
# ██║██║╚██╗██║╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══╝  ╚════██║   ██║   ██╔══╝  ██║╚██╔╝██║██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║   ██║
# ██║██║ ╚████║ ╚████╔╝ ███████╗███████║   ██║   ███████╗██║ ╚═╝ ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║   ██║
# ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝  ╚═══╝  ╚══════╝╚══════╝   ╚═╝   ╚══════╝╚═╝     ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝   ╚═╝
#
# ██████╗  ██████╗  ██████╗ ██╗             ██████╗  ██████╗ ██████╗ ██████╗  ██████╗ ██╗    ██╗██╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗
# ██╔══██╗██╔═══██╗██╔═══██╗██║             ██╔══██╗██╔═══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔═══██╗██║    ██║██║████╗  ██║██╔════╝
# ██████╔╝██║   ██║██║   ██║██║             ██████╔╝██║   ██║██████╔╝██████╔╝██║   ██║██║ █╗ ██║██║██╔██╗ ██║██║  ███╗
# ██╔═══╝ ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║             ██╔══██╗██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██║   ██║██║███╗██║██║██║╚██╗██║██║   ██║
# ██║     ╚██████╔╝╚██████╔╝███████╗███████╗██████╔╝╚██████╔╝██║  ██║██║  ██║╚██████╔╝╚███╔███╔╝██║██║ ╚████║╚██████╔╝
# ╚═╝      ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝╚══════╝╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝ ╚═════╝  ╚══╝╚══╝ ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝

###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################
###########################################################################################################################################################################################

investement_pool_borrowing = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			is_ai = yes
		}

		#more economic_instability - 10%
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_modifier = economic_instability
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.1
			}
		}

		#more 75% - 10%
		if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.75
				not = {
					has_modifier = economic_instability
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.1
			}
		}
		#more 50% - 8%
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.75
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.5
				not = {
					has_modifier = economic_instability
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.08
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.40
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.35
				not = {
					has_modifier = economic_instability
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.08
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.35
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.30
				not = {
					has_modifier = economic_instability
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.07
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.30
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.25
				not = {
					has_modifier = economic_instability
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.06
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.25
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.20
				not = {
					has_modifier = economic_instability
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.05
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.20
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.15
				not = {
					has_modifier = economic_instability
				}

			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.04
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.15
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.10
				not = {
					has_modifier = economic_instability
				}

			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.03
			}
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.10
				private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.05
				not = {
					has_modifier = economic_instability
				}

			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.02
			}

		}

		#at 1 year
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.05
				not = {
					has_modifier = economic_instability
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = base_rate_percentage
				value = 0.05
			}
			# #transfer direct
			# set_variable = {
			# 	name = direct_transfer
			# 	value = money_supply_state_25
			# }
			add_investment_pool = {
				add = {
					add = money_supply
					multiply = 0.20
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#investement_pool regulation

	#add
	if = {
		limit = {
			oe = {
				central_bank_metal_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent > 0.75
				is_player = yes #meme si dépasse continue d'ajouter c'est au joueur de gérer
			}
			oe = {
				private_bank_funds_pourcent < 0.30
				is_player = yes #meme si dépasse continue d'ajouter c'est au joueur de gérer
			}
		}
		add_investment_pool = {
			add = private_bank_borrowings_year
		}

	}

	#subtract - regulation du pool
	if = {
		limit = {
			central_bank_metal_reserves_state_to_ensure_the_conversion_pourcent < 0.75
			private_bank_funds_pourcent > 0.3
			private_bank_funds_pourcent_at_20_to_substract > 0
			is_ai = yes
		}
		add_investment_pool = {
			subtract = private_bank_funds_pourcent_at_20_to_substract
		}
	}

	#purchasable_currency_amount #=quantité de devise en trop pour assurer 100% de couverture

	#quantité de devise achetable
	# every_scope_state = {
	# 	if = {
	# 		limit = {

#  ██████╗███████╗███╗   ██╗████████╗██████╗  █████╗ ██╗             ██████╗  █████╗ ███╗   ██╗██╗  ██╗
# ██╔════╝██╔════╝████╗  ██║╚══██╔══╝██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██║             ██╔══██╗██╔══██╗████╗  ██║██║ ██╔╝
# ██║     █████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║   ██║   ██████╔╝███████║██║             ██████╔╝███████║██╔██╗ ██║█████╔╝
# ██║     ██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║   ██║   ██╔══██╗██╔══██║██║             ██╔══██╗██╔══██║██║╚██╗██║██╔═██╗
# ╚██████╗███████╗██║ ╚████║   ██║   ██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗███████╗██████╔╝██║  ██║██║ ╚████║██║  ██╗
#  ╚═════╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═╝  ╚═╝
#
# ██████╗ ██████╗  ██████╗ ██████╗ ██╗   ██╗ ██████╗████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗        ███╗   ███╗███████╗████████╗██╗  ██╗ ██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗
# ██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔═══██╗██╔══██╗██║   ██║██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║        ████╗ ████║██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝██║  ██║██╔═══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝
# ██████╔╝██████╔╝██║   ██║██║  ██║██║   ██║██║        ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║        ██╔████╔██║█████╗     ██║   ███████║██║   ██║██║  ██║███████╗
# ██╔═══╝ ██╔══██╗██║   ██║██║  ██║██║   ██║██║        ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║        ██║╚██╔╝██║██╔══╝     ██║   ██╔══██║██║   ██║██║  ██║╚════██║
# ██║     ██║  ██║╚██████╔╝██████╔╝╚██████╔╝╚██████╗   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║███████╗██║ ╚═╝ ██║███████╗   ██║   ██║  ██║╚██████╔╝██████╔╝███████║
# ╚═╝     ╚═╝  ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝╚═╝     ╚═╝╚══════╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝  ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝

central_bank_production_methods = {
	every_scope_state = {

		#########################
		#pm_no_metal_consuption
		#########################
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					or  = {
						has_law = law_type:law_no_monetary_system
						has_law = law_type:law_fiat_standard
					}
					#market_owner_is_root_univ_with_buiding = no #-> pas un sujet avec bank dépendente
				}
				# is_production_method_active = {
				# 	building_type = building_bank
				# 	production_method = pm_fiat_standard_bank_money_currency
				# }
				or  = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_silver_consuption
					}
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_gold_consuption
					}
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_bimetallism_consuption
					}
				}
				is_production_method_active = { #écarte les sujet sans marché
					building_type = building_bank
					production_method = pm_no_subject_currency_type
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_metal_consuption
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_subject_currency_type
			}
		}

		#########################
		#pm_silver_consuption
		#########################
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
					#market_owner_is_root_univ_with_buiding = no #-> pas un sujet avec bank dépendente
				}
				# is_production_method_active = {
				# 	building_type = building_bank
				# 	production_method = pm_silver_standard_bank_money_currency
				# }
				or  = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_no_metal_consuption
					}
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_gold_consuption
					}
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_bimetallism_consuption
					}
				}
				# is_production_method_active = { #écarte les sujet sans marché
				# 	building_type = building_bank
				# 	production_method = pm_no_subject_currency_type
				# }
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_silver_consuption
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_subject_currency_type
			}
		}

		#########################
		#pm_bimetallism_consuption
		#########################
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
					#market_owner_is_root_univ_with_buiding = no #-> pas un sujet avec bank dépendente
				}
				# is_production_method_active = {
				# 	building_type = building_bank
				# 	production_method = pm_bimetallism_standard_bank_money_currency
				# }
				or  = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_no_metal_consuption
					}
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_gold_consuption
					}
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_silver_consuption
					}
				}
				# is_production_method_active = { #écarte les sujet sans marché
				# 	building_type = building_bank
				# 	production_method = pm_no_subject_currency_type
				# }
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_bimetallism_consuption
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_subject_currency_type
			}
		}

		#########################
		#pm_gold_consuption
		#########################
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
					#market_owner_is_root_univ_with_buiding = no #-> pas un sujet avec bank dépendente
				}
				# is_production_method_active = {
				# 	building_type = building_bank
				# 	production_method = pm_gold_standard_bank_money_currency
				# }
				or  = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_no_metal_consuption
					}
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_silver_consuption
					}
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_bimetallism_consuption
					}
				}
				# is_production_method_active = { #écarte les sujet sans marché
				# 	building_type = building_bank
				# 	production_method = pm_no_subject_currency_type
				# }
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_gold_consuption
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_subject_currency_type
			}
		}

		#########################
		#pm_gold_consuption
		#########################
		if = {
			limit = {
				# is_production_method_active = {
				# 	building_type = building_bank
				# 	production_method = pm_gold_exchange_standard_bank_money_currency
				# }
				owner = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gold_exchange_standard
				}
				or  = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_silver_consuption
					}
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_gold_consuption
					}
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_bimetallism_consuption
					}
				}
				# is_production_method_active = { #écarte les sujet sans marché
				# 	building_type = building_bank
				# 	production_method = pm_no_subject_currency_type
				# }
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_metal_consuption
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_subject_currency_type
			}
		}
	}
}

#subject
central_bank_production_methods_2 = {
	every_scope_state = {
		#dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					or = {
						any_overlord_or_above = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
						}
						market.owner = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
						}
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_metal_consuption
			}
		}
		#dinar_algerian_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					or = {
						any_overlord_or_above = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
						}
						market.owner = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
						}
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_metal_consuption
			}
		}
		#dinar_iraqi_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					or = {
						any_overlord_or_above = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
						}
						market.owner = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
						}
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_metal_consuption
			}
		}
		#dinar_libyan_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					or = {
						any_overlord_or_above = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
						}

							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
						}
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_metal_consuption
			}
		}
		#dinar_moroccan_dirham
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					or = {
						any_overlord_or_above = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
						}
						market.owner = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
						}
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_moroccan_dirham_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_metal_consuption
			}
		}
		#dinar_omanian_rial
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					or = {
						any_overlord_or_above = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency
						}
						market.owner = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_omanian_rial_currency

					}
				}

							has_law = law_type:law_krone_slovak_koruna_currency
						}
						market.owner = {
							has_law = law_type:law_krone_slovak_koruna_currency
						}
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_krone_slovak_koruna_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_krone_slovak_koruna_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {

						market.owner = {
							has_law = law_type:law_peso_sol_de_oro_currency
						}
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_peso_sol_de_oro_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_peso_sol_de_oro_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_metal_consuption
			}
		}

central_bank_production_methods_2_act = {
	every_country = {
		if = {
			limit = {   
				not   = {
					market.owner = this
				}					
			}
			central_bank_production_methods_2 = yes
		}
	}
}

central_bank_production_methods_3 = {
	every_scope_state = {
		#dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					any_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}
		#dinar_algerian_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					any_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}
		#dinar_iraqi_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					any_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}
		#dinar_libyan_dinar
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					any_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_dinar_libyan_dinar_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}

		#gulden_florin
		if = {
			limit = {
				owner = {
					any_country = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_florin_currency
						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_gulden_florin_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_gulden_florin_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}
		#gulden_hungarian_forint

						has_modifier = global_monetary_reference
					}
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_subject_currency_peso_honduran_lempira_currency
					}
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_subject_currency_peso_honduran_lempira_currency
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_gold_consuption
			}
		}

central_bank_production_methods_4 = {
	every_scope_state = {
		#-> pm_no_gold_standard_bank_money_currency
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_production_method_active = {
					building_type = building_bank
					production_method = pm_no_metal_consuption
				}
				not = {
					is_production_method_active = {
						building_type = building_bank
						production_method = pm_no_subject_currency_type
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
				}
				activate_production_method = {
					building_type = building_bank
					production_method = pm_silver_consuption
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
				}
				activate_production_method = {
					building_type = building_bank
					production_method = pm_bimetallism_consuption
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
				}
				activate_production_method = {
					building_type = building_bank
					production_method = pm_gold_consuption
				}
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_bank
				production_method = pm_no_subject_currency_type
			}
		}

		# # -> pm_gold_exchange_standard_bank_money_currency
		# if = {
		# 	limit = {
		# 		is_production_method_active = {  #si GES alors enlve la nécessité de l'or
		# 			building_type = building_bank
		# 			production_method = pm_gold_exchange_standard_bank_money_currency
		# 		}
		# 		is_production_method_active = {
		# 			building_type = building_bank
		# 			production_method = pm_gold_consuption
		# 		}
		# 	}
		# 	activate_production_method = {
		# 		building_type = building_bank
		# 		production_method = pm_no_metal_consuption
		# 	}
		# 	activate_production_method = {
		# 		building_type = building_bank
		# 		production_method = pm_no_subject_currency_type
		# 	}
		# }
	}
}

# ██████╗ ███████╗███████╗███████╗████████╗     ██████╗ ███████╗██████╗ ████████╗
# ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝     ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝
# ██████╔╝█████╗  ███████╗█████╗     ██║        ██║  ██║█████╗  ██████╔╝   ██║
# ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ╚════██║██╔══╝     ██║        ██║  ██║██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗   ██║
# ██║  ██║███████╗███████║███████╗   ██║███████╗██████╔╝███████╗██████╔╝   ██║███████╗
# ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝   ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═════╝ ╚══════╝╚═════╝    ╚═╝╚══════╝
#
# ██╗███╗   ██╗        ███╗   ██╗ █████╗ ████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗ █████╗ ██╗              ██████╗██╗   ██╗██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗██╗   ██╗
# ██║████╗  ██║        ████╗  ██║██╔══██╗╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║██╔══██╗██║             ██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝
# ██║██╔██╗ ██║        ██╔██╗ ██║███████║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║███████║██║             ██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║      ╚████╔╝
# ██║██║╚██╗██║        ██║╚██╗██║██╔══██║   ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══██║██║             ██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██║       ╚██╔╝
# ██║██║ ╚████║███████╗██║ ╚████║██║  ██║   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║██║  ██║███████╗███████╗╚██████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗   ██║
# ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═╝  ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝

##########################################################################################################################################################################################

reset_debt_in_national_currency = {
	#dinar
	if  = {
		limit  = {
			scope:seller_root = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
			}
			var:debt_in_national_currency_dinar > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar
			subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:debt_in_national_currency_dinar < 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	#dinar_algerian_dinar
	if  = {
		limit  = {
			scope:seller_root = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_algerian_dinar_currency
			}
			var:debt_in_national_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar
			subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:debt_in_national_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar < 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_algerian_dinar
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	#dinar_iraqi_dinar
	if  = {
		limit  = {
			scope:seller_root = {
				has_law = law_type:law_dinar_iraqi_dinar_currency
			}
			var:debt_in_national_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar
			subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:debt_in_national_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar < 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_dinar_iraqi_dinar
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	#dinar_libyan_dinar

		limit  = {
			scope:seller_root = {
				has_law = law_type:law_peso_chilean_peso_currency
			}
			var:debt_in_national_currency_peso_chilean_peso > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_chilean_peso
			subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:debt_in_national_currency_peso_chilean_peso < 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_peso_chilean_peso
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}

			}
			set_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_spe_yuan
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	#spe_zloti
	if  = {
		limit  = {
			scope:seller_root = {
				has_law = law_type:law_spe_zloti_currency
			}
			var:debt_in_national_currency_spe_zloti > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_spe_zloti
			subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:debt_in_national_currency_spe_zloti < 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_spe_zloti
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	#thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
	if  = {
		limit  = {
			scope:seller_root = {
				has_law = law_type:law_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler_currency
			}
			var:debt_in_national_currency_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
			subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:debt_in_national_currency_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler < 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_thaler_hannoveraner_thaler
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	#thaler_prussian_thaler
	if  = {
		limit  = {
			scope:seller_root = {
				has_law = law_type:law_thaler_prussian_thaler_currency
			}
			var:debt_in_national_currency_thaler_prussian_thaler > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_thaler_prussian_thaler
			subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:debt_in_national_currency_thaler_prussian_thaler < 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_thaler_prussian_thaler
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	#thaler_saxon_thaler
	if  = {
		limit  = {
			scope:seller_root = {
				has_law = law_type:law_thaler_saxon_thaler_currency
			}
			var:debt_in_national_currency_thaler_saxon_thaler > 0
		}
		change_variable = {
			name = debt_in_national_currency_thaler_saxon_thaler
			subtract = scope:seller_root.var:stockpiling_overrated_quantity_var
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				var:debt_in_national_currency_thaler_saxon_thaler < 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				name = debt_in_national_currency_thaler_saxon_thaler
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

# ███████╗██╗   ██╗     ██╗███████╗ ██████╗████████╗      ██████╗██╗   ██╗██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗███╗   ██╗ ██████╗██╗   ██╗
# ██╔════╝██║   ██║     ██║██╔════╝██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝     ██╔════╝██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝████╗  ██║██╔════╝╚██╗ ██╔╝
# ███████╗██║   ██║     ██║█████╗  ██║        ██║        ██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝██████╔╝█████╗  ██╔██╗ ██║██║      ╚████╔╝
# ╚════██║██║   ██║██   ██║██╔══╝  ██║        ██║        ██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║╚██╗██║██║       ╚██╔╝
# ███████║╚██████╔╝╚█████╔╝███████╗╚██████╗   ██║███████╗╚██████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗   ██║
# ╚══════╝ ╚═════╝  ╚════╝ ╚══════╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝

remove_suject_currency = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			market_owner_is_root = yes
 			any_scope_building = {
				or = {
					has_modifier = protectora_limit_30
					has_modifier = dominion_limit_50
					has_modifier = puppet_limit_75
				}
			}
		}
		random_scope_building = {
			limit = {
				is_building_group = bg_bank
			}
			remove_modifier = protectora_limit_30
			remove_modifier = dominion_limit_50
			remove_modifier = puppet_limit_75
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			#pm_bond_production
			if = {
				limit = {
					or = {
						is_production_method_active = {
							building_type = building_bank
							production_method = pm_desactive_bc
						}
						is_production_method_active = {
							building_type = building_bank
							production_method = pm_protectora_limit_30
						}
						is_production_method_active = {
							building_type = building_bank
							production_method = pm_dominion_limit_50
						}
						is_production_method_active = {
							building_type = building_bank
							production_method = pm_puppet_limit_75
						}
					}
				}
				activate_production_method = {
					building_type = building_bank
					production_method = pm_no_additional_production_method
				}
			}
		}
		trigger_event = {
			id = central_bank_event.1
		}
		activate_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
	}

	if = {
		limit = {
			not = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gold_exchange_standard
			}
		}
		central_bank_production_methods_4 = yes
	}

	change_variable = {
		name = test_var_3
		add = 100
	}
}
subject_currency = {
	#law_fiat_standard
	if = {
		limit = {
			any_overlord_or_above = {
				has_law = law_type:law_fiat_standard
			}
		}
		activate_law = law_type:law_fiat_standard
	}
	#law_silver_standard
	if = {
		limit = {
			any_overlord_or_above = {
				has_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
			}
		}
		activate_law = law_type:law_silver_standard
	}
	#law_bimetallism_standard
	if = {
		limit = {
			any_overlord_or_above = {
				has_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
			}
		}
		activate_law = law_type:law_bimetallism_standard
	}
	#law_gold_standard
	if = {
		limit = {
			any_overlord_or_above = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
			}
		}
		activate_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
	}
	#law_gold_exchange_standard
	if = {
		limit = {
			any_overlord_or_above = {
				has_law = law_type:law_gold_exchange_standard
			}
		}
		activate_law = law_type:law_gold_standard
	}

	###########################################################################################################################################################################################

	#subject_type_protectorate
	if = {
		limit = {
			is_subject_type = subject_type_protectorate
		}
		random_scope_building = {
			limit = {
				is_building_group = bg_bank
				not = {
					# has_modifier = protectora_limit_30
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = protectora_limit_30
			remove_modifier = dominion_limit_50
			remove_modifier = puppet_limit_75
			add_modifier = {
				name = protectora_limit_30
			}
		}
		#activate_law = law_type:law_protectora_limit_30
		every_scope_state = {
			#pm_bond_production
			if = {
				limit = {
					or = {
						is_production_method_active = {
							building_type = building_bank
							production_method = pm_no_additional_production_method
						}
						is_production_method_active = {
							building_type = building_bank
							production_method = pm_desactive_bc
						}
						is_production_method_active = {
							building_type = building_bank
							production_method = pm_dominion_limit_50
						}
						is_production_method_active = {
							building_type = building_bank
							production_method = pm_puppet_limit_75
						}
					}
				}
				activate_production_method = {
					building_type = building_bank
					production_method = pm_protectora_limit_30
				}
			}
		}
	}

	#subject_type_dominion
	if = {
		limit = {
			is_subject_type = subject_type_dominion
		}
		random_scope_building = {
			limit = {
				is_building_group = bg_bank
				# not = {
				# 	has_modifier = dominion_limit_50
				# }
			}
			remove_modifier = protectora_limit_30
			remove_modifier = dominion_limit_50
			remove_modifier = puppet_limit_75
			add_modifier = {
				name = dominion_limit_50
			}
		}
		#activate_law = law_type:law_protectora_limit_30
		every_scope_state = {
			#pm_bond_production
			if = {
				limit = {
					or = {
						is_production_method_active = {
							building_type = building_bank
							production_method = pm_no_additional_production_method
						}
						is_production_method_active = {
							building_type = building_bank
							production_method = pm_desactive_bc
						}
						is_production_method_active = {
							building_type = building_bank
							production_method = pm_protectora_limit_30
						}
						is_production_method_active = {
							building_type = building_bank
							production_method = pm_puppet_limit_75
						}
					}
				}
				activate_production_method = {
					building_type = building_bank
					production_method = pm_dominion_limit_50
				}
			}
		}
	}
	#subject_type_personal_union
	if = {
		limit = {
			is_subject_type = subject_type_personal_union
		}
		random_scope_building = {
			limit = {
				is_building_group = bg_bank
				not = {
					# has_modifier = dominion_limit_50
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = protectora_limit_30
			remove_modifier = dominion_limit_50
			remove_modifier = puppet_limit_75
			add_modifier = {
				name = dominion_limit_50
			}
		}
		#activate_law = law_type:law_dominion_limit_50
		every_scope_state = {
			#pm_bond_production
			if = {
				limit = {
					or = {
						is_production_method_active = {
							building_type = building_bank
							production_method = pm_no_additional_production_method
						}
						is_production_method_active = {
							building_type = building_bank
							production_method = pm_desactive_bc
						}
						is_production_method_active = {
							building_type = building_bank
							production_method = pm_protectora_limit_30
						}
						is_production_method_active = {
							building_type = building_bank
							production_method = pm_puppet_limit_75
						}
					}
				}
				activate_production_method = {
					building_type = building_bank
					production_method = pm_dominion_limit_50
				}
			}
		}
	}
	#subject_type_puppet
	if = {
		limit = {
			is_subject_type = subject_type_puppet
		}
		random_scope_building = {
			limit = {
				is_building_group = bg_bank
				not = {
					# has_modifier = puppet_limit_75
				}
			}
			remove_modifier = protectora_limit_30
			remove_modifier = dominion_limit_50
			remove_modifier = puppet_limit_75
			add_modifier = {
				name = puppet_limit_75
			}
		}
		#activate_law = law_type:law_puppet_limit_75
		every_scope_state = {
			#pm_bond_production
			if = {
				limit = {
					or = {
						is_production_method_active = {
							building_type = building_bank
							production_method = pm_no_additional_production_method
						}
						is_production_method_active = {
							building_type = building_bank
							production_method = pm_desactive_bc
						}
						is_production_method_active = {
							building_type = building_bank
							production_method = pm_protectora_limit_30
						}
						is_production_method_active = {
							building_type = building_bank
							production_method = pm_dominion_limit_50
						}
					}
				}
				activate_production_method = {
					building_type = building_bank
					production_method = pm_puppet_limit_75
				}
			}
		}
	}
	central_bank_production_methods_2 = yes

	change_variable = {
		name = test_var_3
		add = 1
	}
}
